・在「★4 【悲哀と恋慕の旋律】鳳ここな」的才能绽放中误使用了ジュゴン像。
※我们计划在将来的更新中添加将剩余的「★4 【悲哀と恋慕の旋律】鳳ここなのピース」转换为ジュゴン像的功能。

【2023/8/11 13:32追记】
・在协力公演的シリウス剧院中，匹配等待时间可能显著延长。

【2023/8/10 17:50追记】
・在事件「エレクトリック・サマー・バカンス」的兑换所中，缺失了「歌劇目録」。

【2023/8/9 15:30追记】
・在「★4【私を見守る大切な蝶】千寿いろは」的才能绽放阶段5的奖励中缺失了「SP撮影フィルム【千寿 いろは】」。
※我们计划向已达成才能绽放阶段5的玩家补发该物品。

【2023/8/9 15:30追记】
・在「スターランク」或「ストーリー」中，新消息标记可能无法消失。

【2023/8/8 20:10追记】
・在乐曲「Binary Star」中，游戏可能中途结束。
重新登录标题画面后修正将生效。

【2023/8/1 13:00追记】
・新手任务第七天「完成所有新手任务」的进度可能不足。

【2023/7/29 20:47追记】
・在任务或新手任务中，「加入サークル」可能无法标记为完成。

【2023/7/29 18:45追记】
・「シリウス第二章」演员抽卡的视频可能无法显示。
重新登录标题画面后修正将生效。
※如果显示了「マスターデータの初期化・更新に失敗しました」的错误对话框，请重启应用。

【2023/7/29 17:50追记】
・饰品的图标可能无法显示。
重新登录标题画面后修正将生效。
※如果显示了「マスターデータの初期化・更新に失敗しました」的错误对话框，请重启应用。

【2023/7/29 02:12追记】
・在首页等位置，猫足蕾的站立姿势显示为异常内容。
※修正可能需要一些时间。

【2023/7/28 20:58追记】
・在协力公演的结果画面中，可能无法正常切换到其他页面。

【2023/7/28 20:58追记】
・在特定条件下，「演剧联赛」和「排练」中自动播放可能异常启用。
※确认即使在所有判定为PERFECT*的情况下，也能正常播放。

【2023/7/28 20:58追记】
・在协力公演的结果画面中，其他玩家的结果可能无法正常显示。

【2023/7/28 20:58追记】
・在演出中，可能可以播放尚未解锁的难度OLIVIER。

【2023/7/28 20:58追记】
・在协力公演中选择难度并点击「准备完成」后，可能无法正常选择难度。

【2023/7/28 15:38追记】
・Android设备：「Pixel 6a」在节奏游戏中的图形显示较重。

【2023/7/28 14:10追记】
・在サークル中，发送消息或贴纸到サークル聊天后可能无法正常显示。

【2023/7/27 19:50追记】
・即使sense等级已达上限，仍可能点击等级提升按钮。

【2023/7/27 19:50追记】
・在特定操作下可能过度消耗练习剧本。

【2023/7/27 19:50追记】
・在协力公演的私人剧院中，如果成员未齐，点击公演开始按钮时可能出现对话框，若成员在此时加入，可能导致无法继续操作。

【2023/7/27 09:50更新】
・在勋章兑换中，本巢叶羽的勋章名称与预期不符。
・在勋章兑换中，流石知冴的勋章未显示。
・在Eden主线剧情第一章第七话中，仁花子的台词时显示了テトラ。
・某些演员的sense等级可能超过上限并被强化。

【2023/7/26 15:40追记】
・我们已修正sense等级无法超过上限的问题。
此外，如果将sense等级超过上限的演员编成，可能导致无法开始公演，请暂时将其从编成中移除并进行游戏。
※我们将依次修正sense等级超过上限的演员。

【2023/7/26 21:35追记】
・我们已完成对sense等级超过上限的演员的修正。
此外，在sense等级超过上限时强化「千寿いろは」的sense等级2～5时，仅消耗了强化素材，因此我们将依次向强化了「千寿いろは」的玩家返还强化素材。
素材返还预计将在今天内完成。
对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。
请稍等修正完成。

【2023/7/26 24:00追记】
・对于因上述问题而将「千寿いろは」的sense等级2～5强化并消耗了素材的玩家，我们已补发了相应的素材。
补发的物品可通过「礼物箱」领取。
请查看以下补发内容：

★1【劇団電姫】千寿いろは
sense等级2强化的玩家：役者名鑑×5
sense等级3强化的玩家：役者名鑑×15
sense等级4强化的玩家：役者名鑑×35
sense等级5强化的玩家：役者名鑑×65、花形名鑑×10

★2【オタクでお嬢様】千寿いろは
sense等级2强化的玩家：役者名鑑×10
sense等级3强化的玩家：役者名鑑×30
sense等级4强化的玩家：役者名鑑×60、花形名鑑×10
sense等级5强化的玩家：役者名鑑×90、花形名鑑×30

★3【来ちゃいました！】千寿いろは
sense等级2强化的玩家：役者名鑑×30
sense等级3强化的玩家：役者名鑑×80、花形名鑑×30
sense等级4强化的玩家：役者名鑑×130、花形名鑑×80、スター名鑑×10
sense等级5强化的玩家：役者名鑑×180、花形名鑑×130、スター名鑑×30

对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。

今后也请继续支持「世界大明星 梦想星群」。
i18n.title: 已修正的 bug

i18n.content:
Thank you for using "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."

The following bugs that occurred in the game have been fixed.
※If the fix is not reflected, please restart the app.

Fixed bugs

[2025/9/2 0:50 added]
- The campaign "Accessary Drop Rate 100% UP" is not displayed.

[2025/9/1 15:05 added]
- The stamina consumption for the event "Natsuno Kioku no Naisono Honne!" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 34
　Correct: 32
※We have confirmed that the correct event points and rewards are obtained based on the consumed stamina.

[2025/8/25 12:05 added]
- In the "Main Story," the chapter of Sirius may be displayed incorrectly.
　Also, after completing the 8th episode of the Sirius 4th chapter in the "Main Story," an error may occur when pressing the "Next Episode" button.

[2025/8/20 18:55 added]
- In the Sirius 4th chapter 2nd act of the "Main Story," the voice and text may be mismatched.

[2025/8/19 15:00 added]
- If the SSR 【Birthday Night】Kathrina・Griebel has an unlock level of "0" or "1," the poster may be displayed incorrectly.

[2025/8/12 19:40 added]
- The ability "Performance Power UP III+" of the SSR "Unforgiving Fate" has an unintended activation condition.

Wrong: ◆Performance power increases by 35% (up to 126% when maximally enhanced) ◆Activation condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped  
Correct: ◆Performance power increases by 35% (up to 126% when maximally enhanced)

[2025/8/12 12:00 added]
- In the "Sort/Filter" function for actors, the support light "*" may be displayed on the icons for "Shizuka" and "Senju Iroha" under certain conditions.

[2025/8/8 15:05 added]
- Under certain conditions upon login, it may be possible to receive the reward of the "7th Day Yumesute Day! Login Bonus" twice.
※As an apology for this bug, we have provided the bonus items to accounts who did not receive the reward twice during the following period.
*Compensation items
・Theater Jewel (Free) ×150

*Eligible accounts
・Accounts logged in between 2025/8/7 05:00 and 2025/8/8 05:00

[2025/8/6 13:00 added]
- The bonus reward for STAGE2 of the special event "Kathrina's Birthday Concert 2025" is unintended.
※For the details of the compensation, please refer to the separate announcement titled "Kathrina's Birthday Concert [2025]."

[2025/8/4 18:37 added]
- An error may occur under certain conditions upon login.

[2025/7/31 15:00 added]
- In "Collaborative Performance" or "Challenge with Someone," the total performance power may be displayed lower than expected under certain conditions.

[2025/7/31 15:00 added]
- On certain devices, the number of additional lights obtainable in the "Rearrangement" screen may not be displayed.

[2025/7/31 11:20 added]
- Some titles may be displayed incorrectly.

[2025/7/26 1:05 added]
- The icon for the [Re-release] Birthday Pack 2nd [Niizuma Yae] is displayed incorrectly.
※The sale was temporarily suspended while the fix was being implemented, but it is now resumed.

[2025/7/21 13:15 added]
- When a ★4 actor is obtained, the voice may not play under certain conditions.

[2025/7/2 1:45 added]
- In the poster gacha video for the [Re-release] Girl's Drifting Adventure, an unintended costume icon is displayed.
As compensation, we have distributed "Poster Gacha Ticket ×1."

[2025/7/1 11:50 added]
- Some filters for accessories may not function properly.

[2024/11/21 14:40 added]
- In "Collaborative Performance" and "Challenge with Someone," the performance power and Star Rank bonus effects may not be reflected on the "Matching Waiting Screen" and "Final Confirmation Screen" of the collaboration actor.
※This is a display issue, and the effect is functioning normally.

[2024/11/6 17:50 added]
- In the "Shigure Birthday Concert 2024," the music data for the song "Masquerade (Eden Ver.)" is unintended.

[2024/11/6 11:50 added]
- The ability [Performance Power UP III] of the SSR "Embraced by Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[2024/10/29 11:50 added]
- The ability [Performance Power UP III] of the SSR "Embraced by Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[2024/10/28 16:55 added]
- An error may occur when selecting a stamp obtained upon reaching Star Rank "80" in the "Album."

[2024/10/15 12:35 added]
- In the ability [Add "Light" (Amplification) II] and [Add "Light" (Special) II] of the SSR "Banquet Star: Never Ends," the icon for the sense light is not displayed.

[2024/10/2 17:35 added]
- In the leader skill of ★4 [Come Out from Picture Book] Otori Kokona, some effects are functioning differently than intended in the Iruru part.

[2024/9/24 17:20 added]
- An error may occur when pressing the "Performance" button.
As compensation, we have distributed "Stamina Drink ×1."

[2024/9/19 22:40 added]
- In the "Event Story," an error may occur when selecting certain events.

[2024/9/10 15:00 added]
- Some packs cannot be purchased during flash sales.

[2024/9/10 15:00 added]
- In the gacha [Dialogues Will Not Be Exchanged], the leader skill effect for ★4 [Sing, Dance, and Toast] Yonaguni Hikari is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Shorten the CT of the "Stage" category by 3 seconds  
　Correct: Shorten the CT of the "Stage" category by 5 seconds

[2024/9/10 15:00 added]
- In the Theater League Season 2, the performance effect when determining the class may not play.

[2024/9/10 15:00 added]
- In the "Birthday Concert," incorrect game hints may be displayed.

[2024/9/3 18:50 added]
- An error may occur when attempting to transition to the Theater League TOP screen under certain conditions.

[2024/8/21 15:10 added]
- In the result screen of a performance, the reward for accumulated points may be displayed multiple times.

[2024/8/21 15:10 added]
- In the formation or final confirmation screen, the event bonus for the event "VIBES IN BLUE" may not be displayed.
※This is a display issue, and the event bonus is functioning properly.

[2024/8/10 13:45 added]
- The categories held by 【The Parting of a Former Friend】Ramona・Wolf and 【Waiting for the Small Child】Senju Koyomi are different from the intended ones.

[2024/8/6 10:50 added]
- In the leader skills of 【The Important Butterfly Watching Me】Senju Iroha, ★4【Night of Vivid】Sasuga Chisa, and ★4【The Most Important Thing】Niizuma Yae, some effects are functioning differently than intended in the Iruru part.

[2024/8/5 14:20 added]
- In the mission pass, the "Mission Pass P Purchase" button is displayed before 5:00 on August 1.

[2024/8/5 14:20 added]
- In the "Mission Pass P Purchase" dialog, the number of Theater Jewel (Purchased) required for the purchase is displayed incorrectly.
※At the correct time when the purchase is available (8/1 5:00), the correct number is displayed.
※The correct number is 200 Theater Jewel (Purchased) per 400 P.

[2024/8/5 13:40 added]
- In the album page, the decoration "Kathrina's BirthDay Frame" may not be displayed properly.

[2024/8/1 15:00 added]
- The nameplate "Dai Star [Season 1]" may not be displayed in the highest stage that the user has already obtained.

[2024/7/31 15:00 added]
- In the "Talent Blossom" list, if the actor has a talent blossom level of 6, the piece conversion cannot be performed.

[2024/7/31 15:00 added]
- The filter for "Accessories" may not work properly, making it impossible to proceed.

[2024/7/31 15:00 added]
- The screen orientation is fixed regardless of the device settings.

[2024/7/31 15:00 added]
- In the performance introduction sequence, the curtain may be displayed in an enlarged manner.

[2024/7/31 15:00 added]
- The nameplate "Dai Star [Season 1]" may not be displayed properly.

[2024/7/27 22:20 added]
- In the owned list or formation screen, the filter function for accessories may not work properly, making it impossible to proceed.

[2024/7/27 22:20 added]
- If you play "Practice" from a location other than the Theater Lobby, you may not be able to transition from the result screen.
※We have confirmed that the results of the practice are saved properly.

[2024/7/23 19:00 added]
- An error may occur in "Collaborative Performance" and "Challenge with Someone" when a certain score or higher is obtainable.

[2024/7/18 22:00 added]
- In the "Emerald Medal Exchange," you may not be able to exchange unexchanged posters, or exchanged posters may become exchangeable again.

[2024/6/24 17:35 added]
- An error may occur when transitioning to the ranking screen of the "Circle Mission Rally."
※This is a display issue; the actual ranking is saved properly.

[2024/6/24 17:35 added]
- You may not be able to transition to the "Gacha" screen.

[2024/6/21 17:15 added]
- After playing a long version of a song, the result screen displays a clear mark for difficulty STELLA or higher.

[2024/6/21 17:15 added]
- An error may occur when opening the music detail dialog in the music shop.

[2024/6/21 17:15 added]
- The star count is not displayed correctly.

[2024/6/21 17:15 added]
- In the event story screen, the unread badge may be displayed even after all stories in the selected list are read.

[2024/6/20 15:10 added]
- The "Actor in Poster" section in the poster detail dialog may not display actors.

[2024/6/20 15:10 added]
- When switching to the max enhanced status in the actor detail dialog and poster detail dialog, the full explanation about max enhancement may not be displayed.

[2024/6/11 21:55 added]
- Under certain conditions, an error may occur when attempting to play "Practice," making it impossible to play the selected actor.
※As an apology for this bug, we have distributed the appropriate number of "Theater Jewel (Free)" based on the period of the issue.

[2024/6/11 18:15 added]
- In the "Electra Girl Space [Re:]" event, an unintended accessory is displayed as an additional reward.
※This is a display issue; the picked-up accessories are easier to drop.

[2024/6/11 18:15 added]
- When playing a performance in continuous AUTO mode, the screen may darken and become unresponsive on the second or later play.
※Even in this unresponsive state, the results and rewards of the performance are saved properly.

[2024/5/30 15:00 added]
- In the formation screen, an error may occur when attempting to compose an actor card with a different name but the same actor already in the team.
Example: If you compose ★4【Melody of Sadness and Love】Otori Kokona in slot 1, and attempt to compose ★4【Night Sky Reminds Me】Otori Kokona in slot 2, an error may occur.

[2024/5/30 15:00 added]
- In the Market (Special), the icons of the nameplates "Piled Coins" and "Piled Banknotes" do not turn after purchase.

[2024/5/30 15:00 added]
- In the song "Wish upon a Star" at difficulty STELLA, a MISS judgment may occur when AUTO play is enabled with the "Mirror" option.

[2024/5/29 16:10 added]
- The star act effect text for ★4【In the Theatrical Automaton】Shizuka and ★4【Backstage of a Thrilling Doll Play】Kathrina・Griebel is displayed incorrectly.

[2024/5/14 12:20 added]
- The account linking function "Sign up with Apple" is not working.

[2024/5/1 20:00 added]
- The effect "X% UP for SP obtained in Practice" from the theater is not functioning properly.

[2024/4/19 19:35 added]
- In the mission "Welcome Back: Develop a ★3 or higher photo," completing a ★3 or higher photo may not complete the mission.

[2024/4/19 15:00 added]
- The multi-play disconnection dialog may appear at unintended times.

[2024/4/11 18:35 added]
- When activating a sense with the effect "X seconds of X% score increase," the effect may not be applied if it is activated exactly at the end of the effect duration.

[2024/4/1 22:05 added]
- The leader ability name for "SSR Trioneme and the Devil" is displayed incorrectly.

[2024/4/1 22:05 added]
- The help image in the song selection screen is not displayed.

[2024/3/28 17:00 added]
- An error may occur in the photo list screen where the filter function does not work properly, making it impossible to proceed.

[2024/3/28 17:00 added]
- In the event story list screen, the event logo in the bottom left is not displayed properly.

[2024/3/27 22:15 added]
- In the intermediate judgment between hold notes and scratch hold notes, the amount of life reduction for a MISS judgment is incorrect.

[2024/3/27 22:15 added]
- In the rhythm game result screen, the achievement rate is only displayed up to the second decimal place.
※This is a display issue; the actual achievement rate is recorded properly.

[2024/3/27 22:15 added]
- In the continuous play feature for performances, the "NEW" icon may not disappear after watching an episode with the "NEW" icon.

[2024/3/27 18:05 added]
- The following content may not be playable properly:
　┗Play with Everyone
　┗Challenge with Someone
　┗Chat/Activity in "Circle"

[2024/3/22 12:55 added]
- An error may occur when attempting to play some songs in "Practice."

[2024/2/16 17:00 added]
- In "Batch Development" for photos, some missions in the "Other" category of Star Rank may not be updated properly.

[2024/2/12 13:10 added]
- In "Challenge with Someone," you may not be able to obtain the reward rosette upon completing the subject.
※We are planning to distribute the rosette as compensation after investigation.

[2024/2/29 15:00 added]
- As a compensation for the above bug, we have distributed the rosettes that should have been obtained.

[2024/2/12 13:10 added]
- In the exchange section, the number of Jiragon statues required for the star act activation condition may be displayed twice.
※Currently, there is no actor that requires 9 of the same type of light.
※For the newly added ★3【Which One to Choose?】Fudeshima Shigure, the activation condition is as follows:
"3 1 1"

[2024/2/12 13:10 added]
- An error may occur when attempting to start a practice.

[2024/2/9 15:15 added]
- The stamina consumption for the song "Crystal Bell" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: 25  
　Correct: 28  
※We have confirmed that the correct event points and rewards are obtained based on the consumed stamina.

[2024/2/9 15:15 added]
- The support effect from the theater is not reflected in the numerical display in the formation screen.
※This is a display issue; the effect is functioning properly.

[2024/2/5 18:05 added]
- In the circle chat, if the recipient has left the circle and you open the chat, the chat box may be empty and only the "Back" button may be responsive.

[2024/2/5 18:05 added]
- In the circle, the theater support level may not increase properly.
※We have confirmed that the points are saved properly.

[2024/2/2 13:45 added]
- The sense effect of ★4【Bird That Found a Broken Half】Otori Kokona is not functioning properly.

[2024/2/2 13:45 added]
- In the "My Star Cheer Party," if the rank is outside the top 100 on the "Cheer TOP100" ranking screen, the rank and accumulated cheer points may not be displayed properly.

[2024/2/2 13:45 added]
- In a collaborative performance, after playing once, pressing the stamina recovery button in the header may not respond when attempting to play again.

[2024/1/20 23:00 added]
- When drawing from an actor gacha, the gacha animation may not play properly, displaying a white screen.
※We have confirmed that the actors and items obtained from the gacha are properly received.

[2024/1/19 15:00 added]
- In "Practice," it may be possible to proceed to the song selection screen even when the remaining play count is 0.
※We have confirmed that the actual number of playable "Practice" sessions is correct.

[2024/1/12 16:00 added]
- In the formation screen, the required light count for the star act activation condition may be displayed incorrectly.
※This is a display issue; the actual star act activation conditions and status are functioning properly.

[2024/1/12 16:00 added]
- In the poster filter settings, the poster "Greeting New Year 2024" may not be displayed if the filter is set to "Actor in Poster."

[2024/1/12 16:00 added]
- In the collaborative performance TOP screen, the stamina consumption multiplier may be applied to the regular performance instead of the collaborative performance.

[2024/1/12 16:00 added]
- When recovering stamina with Theater Jewel, the message "※Some items have expired." may be displayed regardless of the item's ownership status.
※This is a display issue; Theater Jewel has no expiration date.

[2024/1/12 16:00 added]
- An error may occur when pressing the "＋" button in the header after purchasing an item in the "Market."

[2024/1/12 16:00 added]
- When the stamina consumption is set to 0 times, stamina may still be consumed.
※Recovery items and Theater Jewel are not consumed.

[2024/1/7 22:15 added]
- In the "New Year Special Campaign" page, rewards cannot be obtained.
※The issue is resolved by re-logging in.

[2024/1/5 18:00 added]
- After the end of the "★4 Select Pickup Gacha" event, the special gacha point exchange is locked.
※We have confirmed that gacha points are retained properly.
※The issue is resolved by re-logging in.

[2024/1/5 12:00 added]
- In the ranking screen of the "New Year Special Campaign," the title display is distorted.

[2023/12/31 15:55 added]
- In the "★4 Select Pickup Gacha" gacha point exchange, the gacha points are displayed as 0.
※This is a display issue; the gacha points have been obtained.
※The issue is resolved by re-logging in.

[2023/12/29 13:05 added]
- After completing a photo session, the result screen may not appear and you may be returned to the title screen.

[2023/12/28 15:15 added]
- In the "Star Rank," the number of missions displayed in each category may be fewer than expected.

[2023/12/28 15:15 added]
- In the "Practice" final confirmation screen, if the number of actors is insufficient for the selected formation and you press "Batch Enhancement," it may cause a crash.

[2023/12/28 15:15 added]
- During rhythm games, if both of the following conditions are met, the rhythm game may not function properly:
　1. Cut-in effect is ON.
　2. More than the required light count for star act activation is granted at once.

[2023/12/28 15:15 added]
- When activating a sense with the effect "X seconds of X% score increase," the effect may not be applied if it is activated exactly at the end of the effect duration.

[2023/12/20 11:30 added]
- In the "Star Rank," the number of missions displayed in each category may be fewer than expected.

[2023/12/20 11:30 added]
- In the "Star Rank," if the "Other" category is completed and the key mission is cleared, the reward may not be obtainable.

[2023/12/15 14:00 added]
- The displayed stamina may be incorrect.
※We have confirmed that stamina is used and recovered properly.

[2023/12/15 14:00 added]
- In the poster change screen, the currently composed poster may not be displayed at the top.

[2023/12/15 14:00 added]
- During the playback of the theater introduction video, the home BGM continues to play.

[2023/12/15 14:00 added]
- In the poster change screen for actors set as leaders, the leader ability may not be displayed.

[2023/12/14 15:00 added]
- In some cases, the name of the pack may be cut off in the purchase confirmation dialog.

[2023/12/14 15:00 added]
- In the collaborative performance, the difficulty setting may not be changeable under certain conditions.

[2023/12/14 15:00 added]
- In the high score reward section of "Practice," the reward for score achievement may not be obtainable.
※We have confirmed that the score achievement status is saved properly.
※We have distributed the reward as compensation to users who did not receive it.

[2023/12/1 12:00 added]
- The selection cursor may not be displayed in the actor selection screen of "Practice."

[2023/12/1 12:00 added]
- If the "Spot Story" is opened once, the episode count may be displayed in the "Side Story" actor selection screen.

[2023/12/1 12:00 added]
- The following bugs regarding the accessory "Cat Ears Headphones" have been fixed:
　- In the accessory detail screen, the scroll bar overlaps with the ability.
　- In the accessory enhancement screen, the effect text for the ability [Add "Light" (SP) II] is only partially displayed.
　- If you possess the "Cat Ears Headphones," two icons of the same accessory may appear in the owned accessories list.
※This is a display issue; the actual count is one.

[2023/11/30 15:00 added]
- The effect amount for the ability "Performance Power UP II" of the SSR "Wanna Be A Star" is incorrect.
※We have corrected the effect amount by increasing it to match the intended "Performance Power UP II" effect.

[2023/11/30 15:00 added]
- The effect text for the ability "Performance Power UP III" of the SSR "The Phantom of the Opera [SIRIUS]" is incorrect.
　Wrong: Actor's focus increases by XX% ◆Activation condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped  
　Correct: Actor's performance power increases by XX% ◆Activation condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped

[2023/11/30 15:00 added]
- Some images may be displayed as loading in the app after returning to the title screen from the menu in the photo list.

[2023/11/30 15:00 added]
- The "Additional Rewards" dialog for a performance may not be displayed properly.

[2023/11/21 12:40 added]
- The "Star Rank" may not function properly.
The issue was fixed with a mandatory update around 12:00 on November 21, 2023.
As compensation, we have distributed "Theater Jewel (Free) ×300."

[2023/11/20 15:00 added]
- The reward for completing all episodes in the event story "The Cry I Cannot Share with Anyone" cannot be obtained.
※We have distributed the reward as compensation to users who completed all episodes before the fix.
※The item can be received from the gift box.

[2023/11/20 15:00 added]
- The filter for singing actors in the song selection screen may not function properly.

[2023/11/20 15:00 added]
- In some theater missions, the clear reward may not be obtainable.
※We have confirmed that the clear status is saved properly.
※We have fixed the issue so that the reward can be obtained normally.

[2023/11/14 13:00 added]
- The accessory details for "Muffler Towel" may not be displayed.

[2023/11/14 13:00 added]
- In the "Joint Music Performance," the timing for sense activation may differ from what is displayed in the dialog.

[2023/11/10 15:10 added]
- In the theater mission "Attempt to clear 3 stages of EXTRA for songs where only actors from Eden are singing," the count may not be updated when clearing "Flare・Fanfare!".
※We have confirmed that this issue is currently resolved.
※For those who have previously cleared "Flare・Fanfare!" in EXTRA, the mission count has been updated.

[2023/11/10 15:10 added]
- In the score detail screen after a performance ends, the score obtained by sense activation may be displayed swapped with another actor's score.
※This is a display issue; the sense effect is functioning properly.

[2023/11/2 12:45 added]
- The appearance of some actors wearing specific costumes may be displayed incorrectly.

[2023/10/31 17:00 added]
- When exchanging actors, the number of Jiragon statues obtained may be displayed incorrectly in the pre-exchange confirmation dialog.
※This does not affect the actual exchange; the correct number is obtained.

[2023/10/31 17:00 added]
- The display of the mission pass may disappear after receiving the reward.
※This does not affect the reward reception.

[2023/10/31 17:00 added]
- After purchasing an item in the Market, the number of items owned may continue to be displayed on the item icon.

[2023/10/31 17:00 added]
- An error may occur when pressing the "Album" button in the friend profile.

[2023/10/24 12:05 added]
- In the opera "Masquerade," some costumes may be displayed incorrectly.

[2023/10/23 17:50 added]
- When wearing the costume "Princess of the Sea" on a specific actor, the actor may not be displayed in "Opera" or "Spot."

[2023/10/20 15:00 added]
- The badge on the "Items" button may not disappear.

[2023/10/20 15:00 added]
- The tap judgment display for notes may not be shown during rhythm games.
※This does not affect the actual judgment.

[2023/10/19 18:30 added]
- Player Rank may not increase beyond 100 even after clearing ☆2 in Stages 51～55 of the audition.
The issue was fixed around 18:20 on October 19, 2023.
The fix is reflected upon re-logging in.
As compensation, we have distributed "Premium Stamina Drink ×5."

[2023/10/10 19:15 added]
- The song "Revolution Dance" may not be playable properly across all difficulties.

[2023/10/10 15:00 added]
- Some images in the "Help" section are not displayed.

[2023/9/29 14:55 added]
- In the "Collaborative Performance," the matching may not be performed properly.
※To resolve the issue, we have restarted the server.
※We have confirmed that the issue is currently resolved.

[2023/9/29 12:50 added]
- In the OLIVIER version of the song "Flare・Fanfare!" the notes may be displayed incorrectly.
※The total number of notes and difficulty are unaffected.
※The data recorded before the fix will be carried over.

[2023/9/26 15:00 added]
- In some screens, the name of ★4【The Cheerful Girl】Kathrina・Griebel may be cut off.

[2023/9/26 15:00 added]
- The notification badge may overlap in the mission button on the home screen.

[2023/9/15 18:00 added]
- The sense effect of ★4【The Observant with Malice】Renjakuno Hatsumi is displayed incorrectly.
The issue was fixed around 13:00 on September 15, 2023.
As compensation, we will distribute "Theater Jewel ×300" to users who own ★4【The Observant with Malice】Renjakuno Hatsumi at a later time.

[2023/9/14 13:00 added]
- In the event high score challenge, the displayed formation may differ from the actual Iruru.

[2023/9/13 15:30 added]
- In the event high score challenge, an error may occur when pressing the high score formation button.

[2023/9/4 19:00 added]
- In the NORMAL version of the song "Sil・V・President," the split random may not be displayed properly when enabled.

[2023/9/1 16:30 added]
- In the additional reward dialog of the "Electra Girl Space," the accessory displayed as "Consume stamina and score 3,000,000 or more" is different from the intended one.
※The actual drop Iruru and probability are the same as for the score 1,500,000 or lower additional reward; this is a display issue.
※If the fix is not reflected, returning to the title screen will reflect the fix.

[2023/8/18 17:00 added]
- In the talent blossom of ★4【Melody of Sadness and Love】Otori Kokona, it is possible to use Jiragon statues.
※If users have already reached talent blossom level 5 using Jiragon statues and have leftover "★4【Melody of Sadness and Love】Otori Kokona's piece," we plan to add a function to convert the leftover pieces into Jiragon statues in a future update.

[2023/8/11 13:32 added]
- In the Sirius Theater of the "Collaborative Performance," the matching wait time may be significantly longer than usual.

[2023/8/10 17:50 added]
- In the event "Electric Summer Vacation," the "Opera Catalogue" is missing from the exchange section.

[2023/8/9 15:30 added]
- In the reward for reaching talent blossom level 5 for ★4【The Important Butterfly Watching Me】Senju Iroha, the "SP Photo Film [Senju Iroha]" is missing.
※We plan to distribute this item as compensation to users who have already reached talent blossom level 5.

[2023/8/9 15:30 added]
- In "Star Rank" and "Story," the new badge may not disappear.

[2023/8/8 20:10 added]
- In the song "Binary Star," the game may end prematurely.
Returning to the title screen will reflect the fix.

[2023/8/1 13:00 added]
- In the 7th day of the beginner mission "Clear all beginner missions," the count may be insufficient.

[2023/7/29 20:47 added]
- In missions and beginner missions, the mission "Join a Circle" may not be marked as cleared.

[2023/7/29 18:45 added]
- The gacha video for the "Sirius Chapter 2" actor gacha is not displayed.
Returning to the title screen will reflect the fix.
※If the error dialog "Failed to initialize or update master data" appears, please restart the app.

[2023/7/29 17:50 added]
- The accessory icons may not be displayed.
Returning to the title screen will reflect the fix.
※If the error dialog "Failed to initialize or update master data" appears, please restart the app.

[2023/7/29 02:12 added]
- The stand pose of Nekoashi Tsubomi may be displayed incorrectly in the home screen or similar.
※It may take some time for the fix to be reflected.

[2023/7/28 20:58 added]
- It may be impossible to transition from the result screen of the "Collaborative Performance."

[2023/7/28 20:58 added]
- Under certain conditions, auto-play may be activated in the "Theater League" and "Practice."
※Currently, even if all judgments are PERFECT*, the auto-play is not activated, and the game can be played properly.

[2023/7/28 20:58 added]
- In the result screen of the "Collaborative Performance," the results of other players may not be displayed properly.

[2023/7/28 20:58 added]
- In the audition, it may be possible to play the difficulty OLIVIER before it is unlocked.

[2023/7/28 20:58 added]
- In the "Collaborative Performance," even after selecting a difficulty and pressing "Ready," the selection may not be registered properly.

[2023/7/28 15:38 added]
- The drawing in the rhythm game is heavy on "Pixel 6a" Android devices.

[2023/7/28 14:10 added]
- In the circle, messages or stamps may not be reflected after being sent in the circle chat.

[2023/7/27 19:50 added]
- Even if the sense level is at the maximum, the level-up button may still be clickable.

[2023/7/27 19:50 added]
- Under certain operations, the practice script may be consumed excessively.

[2023/7/27 19:50 added]
- In the private hall of the collaborative performance, if the members are not ready and the performance starts, and during the dialog the members become ready, the game may become unresponsive.

[2023/7/27 09:50 updated]
- The name of the stamp for Motosu Towa in the medal exchange is different from the intended one.

- The stamp for Sasuga Chisa in the medal exchange is not displayed.

- In the 7th episode of the 1st chapter of the Eden main story, Tetra is displayed when Nikako speaks.

- The sense level of an actor may be enhanced beyond the intended maximum.

[2023/7/26 15:40 added]
- The enhancement of sense level beyond the maximum has been fixed.
If the sense level of an actor is beyond the maximum, please remove the actor from the formation and play.
※We will fix the actors whose sense level was beyond the maximum in sequence.

[2023/7/26 21:35 added]
- The correction of the sense levels beyond the maximum has been completed.
When the sense level was enhanced beyond the maximum, the enhancement material for "Senju Iroha" for sense levels 2～5 was consumed.
We will return the enhancement materials in sequence to users who enhanced the sense levels for "Senju Iroha."
The return of materials is expected to be completed today.
We apologize for the inconvenience.
Please wait a little longer for the fix.

[2023/7/26 24:00 added]
- Regarding users who enhanced the sense levels for "Senju Iroha" from 2～5 and consumed materials due to the bug, we have provided the consumed materials as compensation.
The compensated items can be received from the gift box.
The compensation items are as follows:

★1【Gekidan Denki】Senju Iroha  
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×5  
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×15  
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×35  
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×65, Flower Encyclopedia ×10

★2【Otaku and Lady】Senju Iroha  
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×10  
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×30  
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×60, Flower Encyclopedia ×10  
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×90, Flower Encyclopedia ×30

★3【I'm Here!】Senju Iroha  
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×30  
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×80, Flower Encyclopedia ×30  
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×130, Flower Encyclopedia ×80, Star Encyclopedia ×10  
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×180, Flower Encyclopedia ×130, Star Encyclopedia ×30

★4【The Important Butterfly Watching Me】Senju Iroha  
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×50  
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×150, Flower Encyclopedia ×50  
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×250, Flower Encyclopedia ×150, Star Encyclopedia ×50  
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×350, Flower Encyclopedia ×250, Star Encyclopedia ×150

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused to our users.

Thank you for continuing to support "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."
i18n.title: Fixed bugs

title: 修正済みの不具合

content:
「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をご利用いただき誠にありがとうございます。

ゲーム内にて発生していた以下の不具合の修正が完了いたしました。
※修正が反映されない場合、お手数ですがアプリの再起動をお試しください。

修正済みの不具合

【2025/9/9 20:15追記】
・演目「アラビアンナイト」にて、第2話 ～ 第6話が正常に再生されない

【2025/9/2 0:50追記】
・「アクセサリーのドロップ率 100%UP」のキャンペーンが表示されていない

【2025/9/1 15:05追記】
・「ナツのキオクのナイショのホンネ！」のスタミナ消費量が意図しない数値に設定されている
　誤：34
　正：32
※消費したスタミナ量に対して、獲得イベントポイントや獲得報酬量は正しく入手できていたことを確認しています。

・イベント「肝試せ！ファントムミーティング」のハイスコアチャレンジのセンス発動タイミングにて、下記のタイミングでセンスが発動しない
【修正前】　133秒
【修正後】　125秒

【2025/8/25 12:05追記】
・「メインストーリー」のシリウス第4章にて、話数が意図しない表示となる場合がある
　また、「メインストーリー」のシリウス第4章第8話を読了後、「次話に進む」ボタンを押下するとエラーが発生する

【2025/8/20 18:55追記】
・「メインストーリー」のシリウス第4章第2幕にて、ボイスとテキストが相違している

【2025/8/19 15:00追記】
・「SSR 【Birthday Night】カトリナ・グリーベル」の上限解放段階が「0」または「1」の場合、ポスターが意図しない表示となっている

【2025/8/12 19:40追記】
・「SSR 無情なる運命の中で」のアビリティ「歌唱力アップⅢ＋」の発動条件が実際の発動条件と相違がある

誤：◆自身の歌唱力が35%(最大強化時126%)上昇　◆発動条件：シリウスに所属するアクターが装備
正：◆自身の歌唱力が35%(最大強化時126%)上昇

【2025/8/12 12:00追記】
・アクターの「ソート/フィルタ」機能において、特定の条件を満たした場合、「静香」「千寿いろは」のアイコンに支援系の光「*」が表示される

【2025/8/8 15:05追記】
特定の条件下でログインをした際に、「7がつく日にユメステデー！ログインボーナス」の報酬を2回受け取れる場合がある
※本不具合のお詫びとして、上記のログインボーナス報酬を2回獲得していないお客様に、補填対応を実施いたしました。
*補填内容
・劇ジュエル(無償)×150個

*補填対象
・2025年8月7日 05:00 ～ 2025年8月8日 05:00にログインしているアカウント

【2025/8/6 13:00追記】
・特別イベント「カトリナ 誕生日公演2025」のSTAGE2クリア報酬が意図しない報酬になっている。
※補填の詳細につきましては、別途掲載のお知らせ『「カトリナ 誕生日公演【2025】」』をご確認ください。

【2025/8/4 18:37追記】
・特定の条件下でログインする際にエラーが発生する
※本事象が発生していたお客様のみに、お詫びとして補填アイテムを配布いたしました。

【2025/7/31 15:00追記】
・「協力公演」または「誰かと挑戦」にて、特定の条件を満たした場合、総演技力の表示が本来想定される数値よりも低く表示されている

【2025/7/31 15:00追記】
・一部の端末において、「配置変更」画面にて追加で獲得できる光の数値が表示されない場合がある

【2025/7/31 11:20追記】
・一部の称号において、意図しない表示となっている

【2025/7/26 1:05追記】
【復刻】お誕生日パック2nd【新妻 八恵】のアイコンが意図しないものとなっている
※修正が完了するまでの間、販売を停止していましたが、現在は修正が完了しており販売を再開しております。

【2025/7/21 13:15追記】
・★4アクター獲得演出時において、特定の条件下でボイスが再生されない場合がある

【2025/7/2 1:45追記】
・「【復刻】少女漂流記」ポスターガチャの動画にて、意図しない衣装アイコンが表示されている
補填として、皆様に「ポスターガチャチケット×1枚」を配布いたしました。

【2025/7/1 11:50追記】
・アクセサリーのフィルタ機能において、一部のフィルタが正常に動作しない

【2025/6/28 18:20追記】
チュートリアル開始時の初回ダウンロードを行う際に、エラーが発生する

【2025/6/27 19:40追記】
・期間限定ミッション「【ガールズ＆パンツァー 最終章コラボ8】 劇団電姫に所属するアクターが歌唱する楽曲を10回クリアしよう」にて、対象となる楽曲を「稽古」でクリアした際に、ミッションのカウントが進行しない

【2025/6/26 12:00追記】
・「★4【雨上がりのアキバ・ウォー！】千寿いろは」がリーダーかつ、特定の条件を満たした際に、実際のスコアと異なるスコアが表示される場合がある

【2025/6/19 17:50追記】
・「アクター育成」にて、アクターのレベルを201以上に強化することができない
　また、「一括強化」機能で該当のアクターを選択した場合、進行不能になる

【2025/6/12 13:00追記】
・「改幕公演～第零幕～」にて、STAGE1～19のクリア後に意図しない演出と報酬が表示される
※表示上の問題であり、実際には正しい報酬の獲得、およびクリア状況が保存されていることを確認しております。

【2025/6/10 19:10追記】
・イベント「June Bridal Working!」のイベントポイント交換所にて、イベント「Chuning (your) Rythm !」の「ポイントルーレットチケット」で交換できる「コイン」が含まれている

【2025/5/30 15:00追記】
・「SSR Crossing VENUS」のアビリティ名が意図しないものとなっている
誤：演技力アップⅡ
正：演技力アップⅡ＋＋
※表示上の問題であり、効果は正常に発動していることを確認しております。

【2025/5/29 20:15追記】
・楽曲選択画面にて、「蜘蛛の糸」を選択するとエラーが発生する

【2025/5/26 15:35追記】
・特定の条件を満たした場合、ホーム設定に関わらずホーム画面で「Worlds Dye Star」が再生される

【2025/5/26 15:35追記】
・「改幕公演」にて、TOPで意図しないBGMが再生される場合がある

【2025/5/20 15:00追記】
・「SSR 大人な彼女と子供の僕と」のポスターストーリーを解放した際、スターランクミッションの「カトリナ・グリーベルが描かれたポスターのポスターストーリーをX話解放しよう」が正常に進行しない

【2025/5/9 15:00追記】
・「SSR 大人な彼女と子供の僕と」にて、「ポスター登場アクター」に「カトリナ・グリーベル」が表示されない

【2025/4/30 18:45追記】
・「★3【変わるあの子を見て】鳳ここな」のセンスが意図しないものとなっている

【2025/4/30 15:00追記】
・特定の条件を満たした場合、アクターのステータスが意図しない数値となっている
※表示上の不具合であり、実際のスコアには影響がないことを確認しております。

【2025/4/30 15:00追記】
・「称号＆プロフィール」にて、スターランク100以上のアクターが意図しない値となっている
※表示上の不具合であり、実際のスターランクは正しく記録されています。

【2025/4/26 23:20追記】
・「★4【真実は数奇かつ残酷で】筆島しぐれ」のセンス効果について、センスが発動した際の効果が実際に表示されている効果文言と相違している。

【2025/4/26 18:45追記】
・「編成」にて、「★4【真実は数奇かつ残酷で】筆島しぐれ」をリーダーに設定するとエラーが発生する

【2025/4/26 18:15追記】
・「メインストーリー」のEden第3章1話にて、進行不能になる

【2025/4/25 15:15追記】
・iOS版でOSバージョンが18.0以上の場合、アプリ内からお問い合わせや関連サイトに遷移できない

【2025/4/21 19:00追記】
・「★4【天才の有る栖にようこそ】本巣叶羽」のリーダースキル効果文言に誤りがある
誤：◆「音楽」カテゴリの演技力40%上昇、「運動」カテゴリの集中力が20%上昇・歌唱力10%上昇
正：◆「音楽」カテゴリの演技力40%上昇、「運動」カテゴリの集中力が20%上昇・歌唱力15%上昇

【2025/4/21 14:50追記】
・「SSR Fantasma」のアビリティ「演技力アップⅢ＋」の発動条件が実際の発動条件と相違がある
誤：◆自身の演技力が17.5%(最大強化時63%)上昇　◆発動条件：凛属性アクターが装備
正：◆自身の演技力が17.5%(最大強化時63%)上昇

i18n.title: 已修正的 bug

i18n.content:
Thank you for using 「World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium」.

The following issues that occurred in the game have been fixed.
* If the fixes are not reflected, please try restarting the app.

Fixed Issues

[Added 2025/9/9 20:15]
- In the performance "Arabian Night", episodes 2 to 6 are not playing correctly.

[Added 2025/9/2 0:50]
- The campaign "Accessary Drop Rate 100% UP" is not displayed.

[Added 2025/9/1 15:05]
- The stamina consumption for the event "Natsu no Kio Ku no Nai Sho no Honne!" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 34
　Correct: 32
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

- In the high-score challenge of the event "Kan Shise! Phantom Meeting", the sense activation timing is not functioning at the correct timing.
【Before Fix】 133 seconds
【After Fix】 125 seconds

[Added 2025/8/25 12:05]
- In the "Main Story" of Sirius Chapter 4, the episode number may be displayed incorrectly.
　Additionally, after completing the 8th episode of Sirius Chapter 4 in the "Main Story", an error occurs when pressing the "Next Episode" button.

[Added 2025/8/20 18:55]
- In the "Main Story" of Sirius Chapter 4 Scene 2, the voice and text are mismatched.

[Added 2025/8/19 15:00]
- When the unlock level of "SSR [Birthday Night] Kathrina・Griebel" is "0" or "1", the poster is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2025/8/12 19:40]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III+" of "SSR Shomoe no Unmei de" has an incorrect activation condition.

Wrong: ◆ Own Performance Power increases by 35% (126% at max enhancement) ◆ Activation Condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped
Correct: ◆ Own Performance Power increases by 35% (126% at max enhancement)

[Added 2025/8/12 12:00]
- In the "Sort/Filter" function of actors, under certain conditions, support-type icons "*" are displayed on "Shizuka" and "SenjuIroha".

[Added 2025/8/8 15:05]
- Under certain conditions when logging in, the reward for the "7th Day Login Bonus for Yumesute Day!" might be received twice.
* As an apology for this issue, we distributed the bonus items to users who did not receive the reward twice during the specified period.

* Compensation Items
・Theater Jewel (Free) ×150

* Compensation Target
・Accounts that logged in between 05:00 on August 7, 2025 and 05:00 on August 8, 2025.

[Added 2025/8/6 13:00]
- The bonus reward for the Special Event "Kathrina Birthday Performance 2025" is displayed incorrectly.
* Please refer to the announcement "[Kathrina Birthday Performance 2025]" for details on the compensation.

[Added 2025/8/4 18:37]
- Under certain conditions when logging in, an error may occur.
* As an apology for this issue, we distributed compensation items to affected users.

[Added 2025/8/1 6:10]
- In the "Training" mode, an error may occur when swapping already-composed actors.

[Added 2025/8/1 6:10]
- When transitioning to the home screen, it may take some time to load.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- The "Electron Chocolate Theater! Gacha" is not displayed on the gacha screen.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- In the bonus stage "STAGE 1" of the event "Urarakan Spring, Discover!", the sense activation timing is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- In the bonus stage "STAGE 2" of the event "Urarakan Spring, Discover!", the sense activation timing is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- When transitioning to the ranking screen of "Theater League: TRIPLE CAST", an error may occur.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- The stamina consumption of "1・2・3" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 28
　Correct: 30
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- An error may occur when composing an actor that is already composed in the "Training" mode.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- When transitioning to the home screen, it may take some time to load.

[Added 2025/7/26 0:50]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, the total performance power may be displayed lower than expected under certain conditions.

[Added 2025/7/26 0:50]
- On certain devices, the number of additional lights that can be acquired in the "Reconfiguration" screen may not be displayed.

[Added 2025/7/26 11:20]
- On some titles, the displayed title is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/21 13:15]
- The icon of the "2nd Birthday Pack [Niizuma Yae]" is displayed incorrectly.
* The sale was paused until the fix was completed, but it is now resumed.

[Added 2025/7/2 1:45]
- In the "★4 Actor Acquisition" scene, the voice may not play under certain conditions.

[Added 2025/1/31 18:00]
- In the "Photo" section, an error may occur when developing photos of some actors.

[Added 2025/1/26 20:05]
- The effect text of the leader ability of "★4 [Still Can't Stop Loving] ShiromaruMito" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×10
　Correct: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×10%
* It has been confirmed that the ability functions correctly despite the display issue.

[Added 2025/1/26 20:05]
- The effect text of the sense ability of "★4 [Trickster Fairy Invites You] AkiruKamira" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×5
　Correct: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×5%
* It has been confirmed that the ability functions correctly despite the display issue.

[Added 2024/11/21 14:40]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, the bonus effect from link and star rank may not be reflected on the matching wait screen and final confirmation screen.
* It is a display issue, but the effect is functioning correctly.

[Added 2024/11/6 17:50]
- In the "Shigure Birthday Performance 2024" event, the music data for the song "Masquerade (Eden Ver.)" is incorrect.

[Added 2024/11/6 11:50]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[Added 2024/10/29 11:50]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

i18n.title: Fixed bugs

title: 修正済みの不具合

content:
「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をご利用いただき誠にありがとうございます。

ゲーム内にて発生していた以下の不具合の修正が完了いたしました。
※修正が反映されない場合、お手数ですがアプリの再起動をお試しください。

修正済みの不具合

【2025/9/9 20:15追記】
・演目「アラビアンナイト」にて、第2話 ～ 第6話が正常に再生されない

【2025/9/2 0:50追記】
・「アクセサリーのドロップ率 100%UP」のキャンペーンが表示されていない

【2025/9/1 15:05追記】
・「ナツのキオクのナイショのホンネ！」のスタミナ消費量が意図しない数値に設定されている
　誤：34
　正：32
※消費したスタミナ量に対して、獲得イベントポイントや獲得報酬量は正しく入手できていたことを確認しています。

・イベント「肝試せ！ファントムミーティング」のハイスコアチャレンジのセンス発動タイミングにて、下記のタイミングでセンスが発動しない
【修正前】　133秒
【修正後】　125秒

【2025/8/25 12:05追記】
・「メインストーリー」のシリウス第4章にて、話数が意図しない表示となる場合がある
