【2023/7/28 14:10追记】
・在社团中，发送消息或贴纸后未正常显示

【2023/7/27 19:50追记】
・即使感官等级已达到上限，仍可按下升级按钮

【2023/7/27 19:50追记】
・在特定操作下，练习剧本可能被过度消耗

【2023/7/27 19:50追记】
・在「协力公演」的私人剧场中，如果成员未集齐时按下公演开始按钮，当成员集齐时，对话框显示异常，可能无法继续操作

【2023/7/27 09:50更新】
・「メダル交換」中「本巣叶羽」的印章名称异常

・「メダル交換」中未显示「流石知冴」的印章

・在Eden主线故事第1章7话中，仁花子的台词时显示了テトラ

・在特定条件下，演员的感官等级可能超过上限

【2023/7/26 15:40追记】
我们已修正了感官等级超过上限的问题。
另外，如果编排了感官等级超过上限的演员，将无法开始公演，请将其从编排中移除后进行游玩。
※我们已逐步对感官等级超过上限的演员进行修正

【2023/7/26 21:35追记】
针对感官等级超过上限的演员的修正已完成。
此外，当进行超过上限的感官等级强化时，「千寿いろは」的等级2～5仅消耗了强化素材，我们已逐步向「千寿いろは」的感官等级强化用户返还强化素材。
强化素材的返还预计今日内完成。
对因此问题受到影响的用户，我们深表歉意。
请稍等修正完成。

【2023/7/26 24:00追记】
针对因上述问题导致「千寿いろは」的感官等级2～5被强化并消耗了素材的用户，我们已发放补偿素材。
补偿的物品可通过礼物箱领取。
补偿内容如下：

★1【劇団電姫】千寿いろは
强化了感官等级2的用户：役者名鑑×5
强化了感官等级3的用户：役者名鑑×15
强化了感官等级4的用户：役者名鑑×35
强化了感官等级5的用户：役者名鑑×65、花形名鑑×10

★2【オタクでお嬢様】千寿いろは
强化了感官等级2的用户：役者名鑑×10
强化了感官等级3的用户：役者名鑑×30
强化了感官等级4的用户：役者名鑑×60、花形名鑑×10
强化了感官等级5的用户：役者名鑑×90、花形名鑑×30

★3【来ちゃいました！】千寿いろは
强化了感官等级2的用户：役者名鑑×30
强化了感官等级3的用户：役者名鑑×80、花形名鑑×30
强化了感官等级4的用户：役者名鑑×130、花形名鑑×80、スター名鑑×10
强化了感官等级5的用户：役者名鑑×180、花形名鑑×130、スター名鑑×30

★4【私を見守る大切な蝶】千寿いろは
强化了感官等级2的用户：役者名鑑×50
强化了感官等级3的用户：役者名鑑×150、花形名鑑×50
强化了感官等级4的用户：役者名鑑×250、花形名鑑×150、スター名鑑×50
强化了感官等级5的用户：役者名鑑×350、花形名鑑×250、スター名鑑×150

对因此问题受到影响的用户，我们深表歉意。

今后也请多多关照「世界大明星 梦想星群」。
i18n.title: 已修正的 bug

i18n.content:
Thank you for using 「World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium」.

The following issues that occurred in the game have been fixed.
* If the fixes are not reflected, please try restarting the app.

Fixed Issues

[Added 2025/9/9 20:15]
- In the performance "Arabian Night", episodes 2 to 6 are not playing correctly.

[Added 2025/9/2 0:50]
- The campaign "Accessary Drop Rate 100% UP" is not displayed.

[Added 2025/9/1 15:05]
- The stamina consumption for the event "Natsu no Kio Ku no Nai Sho no Honne!" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 34
　Correct: 32
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

- In the high-score challenge of the event "Kan Shise! Phantom Meeting", the sense activation timing is not functioning at the correct timing.
【Before Fix】 133 seconds
【After Fix】 125 seconds

[Added 2025/8/25 12:05]
- In the "Main Story" of Sirius Chapter 4, the episode number may be displayed incorrectly.
　Additionally, after completing the 8th episode of Sirius Chapter 4 in the "Main Story", an error occurs when pressing the "Next Episode" button.

[Added 2025/8/20 18:55]
- In the "Main Story" of Sirius Chapter 4 Scene 2, the voice and text are mismatched.

[Added 2025/8/19 15:00]
- When the unlock level of "SSR [Birthday Night] Kathrina・Griebel" is "0" or "1", the poster is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2025/8/12 19:40]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III+" of "SSR Shomoe no Unmei de" has an incorrect activation condition.

Wrong: ◆ Own Performance Power increases by 35% (126% at max enhancement) ◆ Activation Condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped
Correct: ◆ Own Performance Power increases by 35% (126% at max enhancement)

[Added 2025/8/12 12:00]
- In the "Sort/Filter" function of actors, under certain conditions, support-type icons "*" are displayed on "Shizuka" and "SenjuIroha".

[Added 2025/8/8 15:05]
- Under certain conditions when logging in, the reward for the "7th Day Login Bonus for Yumesute Day!" might be received twice.
* As an apology for this issue, we distributed the bonus items to users who did not receive the reward twice during the specified period.

* Compensation Items
・Theater Jewel (Free) ×150

* Compensation Target
・Accounts that logged in between 05:00 on August 7, 2025 and 05:00 on August 8, 2025.

[Added 2025/8/6 13:00]
- The bonus reward for the Special Event "Kathrina Birthday Performance 2025" is displayed incorrectly.
* Please refer to the announcement "[Kathrina Birthday Performance 2025]" for details on the compensation.

[Added 2025/8/4 18:37]
- Under certain conditions when logging in, an error may occur.
* As an apology for this issue, we distributed compensation items to affected users.

[Added 2025/8/1 6:10]
- In the "Training" mode, an error may occur when swapping already-composed actors.

[Added 2025/8/1 6:10]
- When transitioning to the home screen, it may take some time to load.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- The "Electron Chocolate Theater! Gacha" is not displayed on the gacha screen.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- In the bonus stage "STAGE 1" of the event "Urarakan Spring, Discover!", the sense activation timing is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- In the bonus stage "STAGE 2" of the event "Urarakan Spring, Discover!", the sense activation timing is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- When transitioning to the ranking screen of "Theater League: TRIPLE CAST", an error may occur.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- The stamina consumption of "1・2・3" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 28
　Correct: 30
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- An error may occur when composing an actor that is already composed in the "Training" mode.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- When transitioning to the home screen, it may take some time to load.

[Added 2025/7/26 0:50]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, the total performance power may be displayed lower than expected under certain conditions.

[Added 2025/7/26 0:50]
- On certain devices, the number of additional lights that can be acquired in the "Reconfiguration" screen may not be displayed.

[Added 2025/7/26 11:20]
- On some titles, the displayed title is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/21 13:15]
- The icon of the "2nd Birthday Pack [Niizuma Yae]" is displayed incorrectly.
* The sale was paused until the fix was completed, but it is now resumed.

[Added 2025/7/2 1:45]
- In the "★4 Actor Acquisition" scene, the voice may not play under certain conditions.

[Added 2025/1/31 18:00]
- In the "Photo" section, an error may occur when developing photos of some actors.

[Added 2025/1/26 20:05]
- The effect text of the leader ability of "★4 [Still Can't Stop Loving] ShiromaruMito" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×10
　Correct: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×10%
* It has been confirmed that the ability functions correctly despite the display issue.

[Added 2025/1/26 20:05]
- The effect text of the sense ability of "★4 [Trickster Fairy Invites You] AkiruKamira" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×5
　Correct: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×5%
* It has been confirmed that the ability functions correctly despite the display issue.

[Added 2024/11/21 14:40]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, the bonus effect from link and star rank may not be reflected on the matching wait screen and final confirmation screen.
* It is a display issue, but the effect is functioning correctly.

[Added 2024/11/6 17:50]
- In the "Shigure Birthday Performance 2024" event, the music data for the song "Masquerade (Eden Ver.)" is incorrect.

[Added 2024/11/6 11:50]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[Added 2024/10/29 11:50]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[Added 2024/10/28 16:55]
- An error may occur when selecting a stamp for reaching Star Rank 80 in the "Album" section.

[Added 2024/10/15 12:35]
- In the ability "Light Addition (Amplification) II" and "Light Addition (Special) II" of "SSR Banquet Star: Never End", the icon for sense light is not displayed.

[Added 2024/10/2 17:35]
- In the leader skill of "★4 [Come Out of the Picture Book] OtoriKokona", the effect may differ from the intended one in certain cases.

[Added 2024/9/24 17:20]
- An error may occur when pressing the "Performance" button.
* As compensation, we distributed "Stamina Drink ×1" to all users.

[Added 2024/9/19 22:40]
- An error may occur when selecting an event in the "Event Story" section.

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- Some packs cannot be purchased during the flash sale.

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- The leader skill effect of "★4 [Sing, Dance, and Raise a Glass] YonaguniHikari" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Reduce CT for the "Stage" category by 3 seconds
　Correct: Reduce CT for the "Stage" category by 5 seconds

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- In the Theater League Season 2, the class determination performance may not play properly under certain conditions.

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- In the "Birthday Performance" event, incorrect game hints may be displayed.

[Added 2024/9/3 18:50]
- An error may occur when trying to transition to the Theater League TOP screen under certain conditions.

[Added 2024/8/21 15:10]
- In the result screen of the "Performance" mode, the bonus reward for accumulated points may be displayed multiple times.

[Added 2024/8/21 15:10]
- In the formation or final confirmation screen, the bonus of the event "VIBES IN BLUE" is not displayed.
* It is a display issue, but the bonus is functioning correctly.

[Added 2024/8/10 13:45]
- The categories of "[Once Again, the Departure of an Old Friend] Ramona・Wolf" and "[Waiting for the Small One] SenjuKoyomi" are mismatched.

[Added 2024/8/6 10:50]
- The leader skill of "[The Precious Butterfly Watching Me] SenjuIroha", "[Night of Vivid Colors] SasugaChisa", and "[The Most Important Thing] NiizumaYae" is functioning differently than intended in some cases.

[Added 2024/8/5 14:20]
- In the "Mission Pass", the "Mission Pass Purchase" button is displayed before 5:00 on August 1.

[Added 2024/8/5 14:20]
- In the "Mission Pass Purchase" dialog, the number of Theater Jewels (Purchased) consumed is displayed incorrectly.
* At the correct time when the purchase becomes available (8/1 5:00), the correct consumption number is displayed.
* The correct consumption number is 200 Theater Jewels (Purchased) per 400P.

[Added 2024/8/5 13:40]
- In the album page, the decoration "Kathrina's Birthday Frame" is not displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/8/1 15:00]
- The nameplate "Dai Star [Season 1]" may not be displayed in the highest stage when it was already acquired.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- In the "Pieces List Screen" of the "Possessions" section, when an actor has talent blooming stage 6, the piece conversion may not be possible.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- In the "Filter" function of accessories, the "Additional Ability" filter is not working properly.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- The screen orientation is fixed regardless of the device settings.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- In the rhythm game performance scene, the curtain may be displayed enlarged.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- The nameplate "Dai Star [Season 1]" may not be displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/7/27 22:20]
- In the possession list or formation screen, the filter function for accessories may not work properly, causing the app to freeze.

[Added 2024/7/27 22:20]
- When playing "Training" from a location other than the Theater Lobby, the result screen may not transition properly and instead return to the title screen.
* It has been confirmed that the training results are saved properly.

[Added 2024/7/23 19:00]
- In "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, an error may occur if a certain score or higher is achieved.

[Added 2024/7/18 22:00]
- In the "Emerald Medal Exchange", unexchanged posters cannot be exchanged, and exchanged posters may become exchangeable again.

[Added 2024/6/24 17:35]
- An error may occur when transitioning to the ranking screen of the "Circle Mission Rally".
* It is a display issue, but the actual ranking is saved correctly.

[Added 2024/6/24 17:35]
- An error may occur when transitioning to the gacha screen.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- After playing the long version of a song, the clear mark for difficulty STELLA or higher is displayed.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- An error may occur when opening the song details dialog in the song shop.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- The medal values may not be displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- In the event story screen, the unread badge may still be displayed even if all stories in the selected list are marked as read.

[Added 2024/6/20 15:10]
- In the poster details dialog, no actor is displayed under "Poster Appearance Actors".

[Added 2024/6/20 15:10]
- In the actor details dialog and poster details dialog, when switching to the status at maximum enhancement, the description indicating maximum enhancement may not be fully displayed.

[Added 2024/6/11 21:55]
- Under certain conditions, an error may occur when attempting to play "Training", which may prevent the actor from being used in future training sessions.
* As compensation, we distributed the corresponding number of "Theater Jewel (Free)" to affected users based on the duration of the issue.

[Added 2024/6/11 18:15]
- In the "Electric Princess Space [Re:]" event, an unintended accessory is displayed in the bonus rewards.
* It is a display issue, but the picked-up accessories are easier to drop.

[Added 2024/6/11 18:15]
- When playing a performance in continuous AUTO mode, the screen may darken and become unresponsive on the second and subsequent plays.
* Even when the screen is unresponsive, the performance results during AUTO play are saved and rewards are received.

[Added 2024/5/30 15:00]
- In the formation screen, an error may occur when attempting to compose an actor with a different card of the same actor already composed.
Example: If "★4 [Melody of Sorrow and Love] OtoriKokona" is already composed in the first slot, attempting to compose "★4 [Night Sky Reminds Me] OtoriKokona" in the second slot may cause an error.

[Added 2024/5/30 15:00]
- In the Market (Special), the icons of the nameplates "Pile of Coins" and "Banknotes" may not brighten after purchase.

[Added 2024/5/30 15:00]
- In the rhythm game "Wish upon a star" at difficulty STELLA, a MISS judgment may occur when AUTO play is performed with the "Mirror" option enabled.

[Added 2024/5/29 16:10]
- The effect text of the leader act of "★4 [In the Automaton Theater] Shizuka" and "★4 [The Backstage of a Dancing Doll] Kathrina・Griebel" is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2024/5/14 12:20]
- Account linking via "Sign up with Apple" cannot be performed.

[Added 2024/5/1 20:00]
- The theater effect "Increase SP gained from Training by XX%" is not functioning properly.

[Added 2024/4/19 19:35]
- In the mission "Welcome Back: Develop a ★3 or higher photo", users may not complete the mission even after developing a ★3 or higher photo.

[Added 2024/4/19 15:00]
- The dialog for detecting a disconnection during multiplay may be displayed at an unintended timing.

[Added 2024/4/11 18:35]
- When a sense with the effect "Increase Star Act Score by XX% for XX seconds" is activated, the effect may not be applied when the effect time ends.

[Added 2024/4/1 22:05]
- The name of the leader ability of "SSR Trio Melody and Demon" is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2024/4/1 22:05]
- The help image in the song selection screen is not displayed.

[Added 2024/3/28 17:00]
- In the photo list screen, the filter function may not work properly, causing the app to freeze.

[Added 2024/3/28 17:00]
- In the event story list screen, the event logo at the lower left is not displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/3/27 22:15]
- In the intermediate judgment of hold notes and scratch hold notes, the life decrease amount for MISS judgment is incorrect.

[Added 2024/3/27 22:15]
- In the detailed result screen of the rhythm game, the achievement rate is only displayed up to the second decimal place.
* It is a display issue, but the actual achievement rate is recorded correctly.

[Added 2024/3/27 22:15]
- In the continuous performance feature of the play, the "NEW" icon may remain visible even after watching an episode with the icon displayed.

[Added 2024/3/27 18:05]
- The following contents cannot be played properly.
　┗ Play Together
　┗ Challenge with a Partner
　┗ Chat/Activity in the "Circle"

[Added 2024/3/22 12:55]
- In the "Training" mode, an error may occur when attempting to play some songs.

[Added 2024/2/16 17:00]
- In the "Batch Development" of photos, the mission "Develop a photo with actor X as the main subject X times" in the "Other" category may not progress.

[Added 2024/2/12 13:10]
- In the "Challenge with a Partner" mode, the reward rosette may not be received after completing a challenge.
* We are currently investigating the issue and plan to distribute the missing rosettes at a later date.

[Added 2024/2/29 15:00]
- We have distributed the missing rosettes as compensation for the issue mentioned above.

[Added 2024/2/12 13:10]
- In the exchange shop, when viewing actor details, the number of required stars for the star act is displayed incorrectly.
* It has been confirmed that there are no actors requiring 9 of one type of light for the star act at this time.
* The star act activation condition for the newly added actor "★3 [Which One Should I Choose?] FudeshimaShigure" is as follows.
"3 stars, 1 star, 1 star"

[Added 2024/2/12 13:10]
- An error may occur when starting "Training".

[Added 2024/2/9 15:15]
- The stamina consumption of the song "Crystal Bell" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 25
　Correct: 28
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

[Added 2024/2/9 15:15]
- The support theater effect is not reflected visually in the formation screen.
* It is a display issue, but the effect is functioning correctly.

[Added 2024/2/5 18:05]
- In the circle chat, if a user who was selected as a recipient leaves the circle before the chat is opened, there may be no display in the chat window and only the "Back" button is operable.

[Added 2024/2/5 18:05]
- In the circle, the support level of the theater may not increase properly in some cases.
* It has been confirmed that points are being saved properly.

[Added 2024/2/2 13:45]
- The sense effect of "★4 [The Bird That Found a Broken Piece] OtoriKokona" is not functioning properly.

[Added 2024/2/2 13:45]
- In the event "My Stellar Cheer Party", if a user is out of the top 100 in the support ranking, the ranking and accumulated support points may not be displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/2/2 13:45]
- In the collaborative performance, after playing once and trying to play again, the stamina recovery button in the header may not respond.

[Added 2023/12/31 23:00]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" mode, matching may not occur properly.
* To resolve the issue, we restarted the server devices.
* It has been confirmed that the issue is now resolved.

[Added 2023/12/29 13:05]
- In the song "Fleur-de-France・Fanfare!" of the OLIVIER version, some notes are displayed incorrectly.
* The total number of notes and difficulty are not affected by the fix.
* Data recorded before the fix will be carried over.

[Added 2023/12/28 15:15]
- In some screens, the actor name "★4 [Pretty Cheer Girl] Kathrina・Griebel" is cut off.

[Added 2023/12/28 15:15]
- The mission button on the home screen may have overlapping notification badges.

[Added 2023/12/20 11:30]
- In the "Star Rank" feature, the number of missions displayed in each category may be less than expected.

[Added 2023/12/20 11:30]
- In the "Star Rank" feature, if the complete mission in the "Other" category meets the clear conditions, the reward may not be received properly.
* We plan to distribute the missing items to users who have completed the missions up to that point.

[Added 2023/12/15 14:00]
- The held stamina may be displayed incorrectly.
* It has been confirmed that stamina can be used and recovered properly despite the display issue.

[Added 2023/12/15 14:00]
- In the poster change screen, the currently composed poster may not be displayed on the top.

[Added 2023/12/15 14:00]
- During the playback of the theater introduction video, the home BGM may continue to play.

[Added 2023/12/15 14:00]
- In the poster change screen of the leader actor, the leader ability may not be displayed.

[Added 2023/12/14 15:00]
- In some cases, the name of the pack being purchased is cut off in the purchase confirmation dialog.

[Added 2023/12/14 15:00]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" mode, the difficulty may not be changeable under certain conditions.

[Added 2023/12/14 15:00]
- In the high-score reward of "Training", the reward may not be received even after the score is achieved.
* It has been confirmed that the score is saved properly.
* We have distributed the missing rewards to affected users.

[Added 2023/12/1 12:00]
- In the actor selection screen of "Training", the selection cursor may not be displayed.

[Added 2023/12/1 12:00]
- If a side story is opened once, the episode count may be displayed in the actor selection screen of the side story.

[Added 2023/12/1 12:00]
- The following issues with the accessory "Cat Ear Headphones" have been fixed:
・In the accessory details screen, the scroll bar overlaps with the ability.
・In the accessory enhancement screen, the effect text of the ability "Light Addition (SP) II" is not fully displayed.
・If the user possesses "Cat Ear Headphones", it may be displayed twice in the accessory list.
* It is a display issue, but the actual number of possessed items is one.

[Added 2023/11/30 15:00]
- The effect amount of the ability "Performance Power Up II" of "SSR Wanna Be A Star" is incorrect.
　* The effect amount was mistakenly displayed as "Performance Power Up +", and we have corrected it to "Performance Power Up II".

[Added 2023/11/30 15:00]
- The effect text of the ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR [SIRIUS] The Phantom of the Opera" is incorrect.
　Wrong: Own concentration increases by XX% ◆ Activation Condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped
　Correct: Own performance power increases by XX% ◆ Activation Condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped

[Added 2023/11/30 15:00]
- Some images may be displayed as loading during the app relaunch from the "Menu" section of the "Photo List".

[Added 2023/11/30 15:00]
- The "Additional Reward" dialog in the performance may not display properly.

[Added 2023/11/21 12:40]
- The "Star Rank" feature may not function properly in some cases.
* We have implemented a mandatory update to fix the issue around 12:00 on November 21, 2023.
* As compensation, we have distributed "Theater Jewel (Free) ×300" to all users.

[Added 2023/11/20 15:00]
- In the event "The Scream I Can't Tell Anyone", the reward for completing all stories cannot be received.
* We have distributed the reward as compensation to users who completed all stories before the fix.
* The item can be received from the gift box.

[Added 2023/11/20 15:00]
- In the song selection screen, the filter by singing actor may not function properly.

[Added 2023/11/20 15:00]
- In some theater missions, the clear reward may not be received.
* It has been confirmed that the clear status is saved properly.
* We have corrected the issue to allow the reward to be received properly.

[Added 2023/11/14 13:00]
- The accessory details of "Muffler Towel" may not be displayed.

[Added 2023/11/14 13:00]
- In the "Collaborative Musical Performance" mode, the sense activation timing is mismatched with the displayed dialog.

[Added 2023/11/10 15:10]
- In the mission "Attempt to clear 3 songs of EXTRA difficulty for songs sung by actors in Eden", the count may not increase upon clearing "Fleur-de-France・Fanfare!".
* We have confirmed that the issue is resolved and the count has been updated for users who previously cleared "Fleur-de-France・Fanfare!" in the EXTRA difficulty.

[Added 2023/11/10 15:10]
- In the score detail screen after a performance, the scores obtained by actors through sense activation may be displayed in the wrong order.
* It is a display issue, and the sense effect is functioning correctly.

[Added 2023/11/2 12:45]
- The appearance of certain costumes for some actors is incorrect.

[Added 2023/10/31 17:00]
- The number of medals gained in the exchange confirmation dialog is displayed incorrectly.
* The actual exchange is unaffected, and the correct number is received.

[Added 2023/10/31 17:00]
- The path display in the mission pass may disappear after receiving rewards.
* It does not affect the reward reception.

[Added 2023/10/31 17:00]
- After purchasing items in the market, the number of items held may continue to be displayed on the icon.

[Added 2023/10/31 17:00]
- An error may occur when pressing the "Album" button in a friend's profile.

[Added 2023/10/24 12:05]
- In the musical "Masquerade", some costumes are displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2023/10/23 17:50]
- When certain actors wear the costume "Princess of the Sea", they may not appear in the "Musical" and "Spot" sections.

[Added 2023/10/20 15:00]
- The badge of the "Possessions" button may not disappear.

[Added 2023/10/20 15:00]
- In some cases, the tap judgment display of the notes during the rhythm game may not appear.
* It does not affect the actual judgment.

[Added 2023/10/19 18:30]
- The player rank limit does not increase even after clearing the 2-star songs in the audition stage 51-55.
* We have completed the fix around 18:20 on October 19, 2023.
* The fix is reflected after relogging in.
* As compensation, we have distributed "Premium Stamina Drink ×5" to all users.

[Added 2023/10/10 19:15]
- In the song "Revolution Dance" for all difficulties, the game cannot be played properly.

[Added 2023/10/10 15:00]
- Images in the "Help" section are not displayed.

[Added 2023/9/29 14:55]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" mode, the matching may not occur properly.
* To resolve the issue, we restarted the server devices.
* It has been confirmed that the issue is now resolved.

[Added 2023/9/29 12:50]
- In the OLIVIER version of the song "Fleur-de-France・Fanfare!", some notes are displayed incorrectly.
* The total number of notes and difficulty are not affected by the fix.
* Data recorded before the fix will be carried over.

[Added 2023/9/26 15:00]
- In some screens, the actor name "★4 [Pretty Cheer Girl] Kathrina・Griebel" is cut off.

[Added 2023/9/26 15:00]
- On the home screen mission button, the notification badges may overlap.

[Added 2023/9/15 18:00]
- The sense effect of "★4 [Malicious Observer] RenjakunoHatsumi" is displayed incorrectly.
* We have completed the fix around 13:00 on September 15, 2023.
* As compensation, we will distribute "Theater Jewel ×300" to users who possess "★4 [Malicious Observer] RenjakunoHatsumi" at a later date.

[Added 2023/9/14 13:00]
- In the high-score challenge of the event, the displayed composition may differ from the actual one.

[Added 2023/9/13 15:30]
- In the high-score challenge of the event, an error may occur when pressing the high-score composition button.

[Added 2023/9/4 19:00]
- In the NORMAL version of the song "Sylvestre President", the split random mode may not be displayed properly when enabled.

[Added 2023/9/1 16:30]
- In the bonus reward dialog of the "Electric Princess Space" event, the displayed reward for "Consume Stamina + Score 3,000,000 or higher" is incorrect.
* The actual drop rate and items are the same as the bonus rewards for score 1,500,000 or lower.
* It is a display issue only.
* If the fix is not reflected, please return to the title screen once for the fix to take effect.

[Added 2023/8/18 17:00]
- In the talent blooming stage 5 reward of "★4 [Melody of Sorrow and Love] OtoriKokona", the "SP Photo Film [Senju Iroha]" is missing.
* We will distribute the missing item to users who have already reached talent blooming stage 5 in a future update.

[Added 2023/8/18 17:00]
- In some cases, the new notification badges in the Star Rank and Story sections may not disappear.

[Added 2023/8/8 20:10]
- In the song "Binary Star", the game may end prematurely.
* Please return to the title screen once for the fix to take effect.

[Added 2023/8/1 13:00]
- In the 7th day mission of the beginner mission "Clear all beginner missions", the count may be missing.

[Added 2023/7/29 20:47]
- In the missions and beginner missions, the "Join a Circle" mission may not be marked as completed.

[Added 2023/7/29 18:45]
- The video of the "Sirius Chapter 2" actor gacha is not displayed.
* Please return to the title screen once for the fix to take effect.
* If the error dialog "Failed to Initialize/Update Master Data" appears, please try restarting the app.

[Added 2023/7/29 17:50]
- The accessory icons are not displayed.
* Please return to the title screen once for the fix to take effect.
* If the error dialog "Failed to Initialize/Update Master Data" appears, please try restarting the app.

[Added 2023/7/29 02:12]
- In the home screen, etc., the standing pose of NekoashiTsubomi is displayed incorrectly.
* It may take some time for the fix to be reflected.

[Added 2023/7/28 20:58]
- It may not be possible to transition from the result screen of the "Collaboration Performance" mode.

[Added 2023/7/28 20:58]
- Under certain conditions, the auto-play may become enabled in the "Theater League" and "Training" modes.
* It has been confirmed that the game can be played properly even if all judgments are PERFECT*.

[Added 2023/7/28 20:58]
- In the result screen of the "Collaboration Performance" mode, other players' results may not be displayed properly.

[Added 2023/7/28 20:58]
- Under certain conditions, it may be possible to play the OLIVIER difficulty in the audition that has not been unlocked yet.

[Added 2023/7/28 20:58]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" mode, even if the difficulty is selected and the "Ready" button is pressed, the selection may not be registered.

[Added 2023/7/28 15:38]
- On Android devices, specifically the "Pixel 6a", the rhythm game graphics may be laggy.

[Added 2023/7/28 14:10]
- In the circle, messages or stamps sent in the circle chat may not be reflected.

[Added 2023/7/27 19:50]
- Even if the sense level is at the maximum, the level-up button may still be clickable.

[Added 2023/7/27 19:50]
- In some cases, the practice script may be consumed excessively due to specific operations.

[Added 2023/7/27 19:50]
- In the private theater of the "Collaboration Performance" mode, if the members are not ready but join during the error dialog, the app may freeze.

[Added 2023/7/27 09:50]
- The name of the stamp for MotosuTowa in the medal exchange is mismatched.

- The stamp for SasugaChisa in the medal exchange is not displayed.

- In the 7th episode of the first chapter of the Eden main story, the Tetra image is displayed when Nikako speaks.

- The sense level of some actors may be enhanced beyond the intended maximum.

[Added 2023/7/26 15:40]
- The sense level can no longer be enhanced beyond the maximum.
* If the sense level of an actor exceeds the maximum, please remove the actor from the formation and play until the fix is applied.
* We will fix the actors whose sense level exceeded the maximum one by one.

[Added 2023/7/26 21:35]
- The correction of the sense level exceeding the maximum for affected actors has been completed.
* When the enhancement of the sense level beyond the maximum was attempted, only the sense level 2-5 of "SenjuIroha" consumed the enhancement materials. We will return the consumed materials to these users sequentially.
* The return of the enhancement materials is expected to be completed today.
* We apologize for the inconvenience.
* Please wait a while for the fix to be applied.

[Added 2023/7/26 24:00]
- For users who enhanced the sense level of "SenjuIroha" 2-5 and consumed materials due to the above error, we have provided the consumed materials as compensation.
* The compensation items can be received from the gift box.
* Please check the following compensation details:

★1 [Gekidan Denki] SenjuIroha
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×5
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×15
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×35
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×65, Popular Encyclopedia ×10

★2 [Otaku and Lady] SenjuIroha
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×10
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×30
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×60, Popular Encyclopedia ×10
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×90, Popular Encyclopedia ×30

★3 [Welcome!] SenjuIroha
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×30
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×80, Popular Encyclopedia ×30
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×130, Popular Encyclopedia ×80, Star Encyclopedia ×10
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×180, Popular Encyclopedia ×130, Star Encyclopedia ×30

★4 [Precious Butterfly Watching Me] SenjuIroha
Users who enhanced sense level 2: Actor Encyclopedia ×50
Users who enhanced sense level 3: Actor Encyclopedia ×150, Popular Encyclopedia ×50
Users who enhanced sense level 4: Actor Encyclopedia ×250, Popular Encyclopedia ×150, Star Encyclopedia ×50
Users who enhanced sense level 5: Actor Encyclopedia ×350, Popular Encyclopedia ×250, Star Encyclopedia ×150

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to our users.

We appreciate your continued support for "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium".
i18n.title: Fixed bugs

title: 修正済みの不具合

content:
「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をご利用いただき誠にありがとうございます。

現在ゲーム内にて以下の不具合を確認しております。

修正中の不具合

【2023/11/10 23:30追記】
・楽曲選択画面において、カーソル選択中の楽曲とプレビュー中の楽曲が一致しないことがある

【2023/10/10 17:00追記】
・アルバム上でサイン付きフォトのサインが表示されないことがある
※アルバムの保存を再度行うことで解消されることを確認しております。
※本不具合はアルバム上での表示の問題であり、サイン付きフォトのデータは保持されています。

・「Sign up with Apple」または「Sign in with Google」にてアカウント連携を行うと、アカウント連携時に表示されるプレイヤーIDが異なる場合がある
※本不具合は表示上のみとなっており、アカウント連携は正常に行えることを確認しております。

調査中の不具合

【2024/8/9 22:45追記】
・演劇リーグシーズン2にて、所属クラス決定時の演出が再生されない場合がある

【2024/7/30 17:00追記】
・演劇リーグシーズン2初回入場時、シーズン1の結果に応じて本来意図しない演出が再生される場合がある。

【2024/7/29 15:00追記】
・アクターガチャで★4アクターを獲得した際、獲得したアクターピースの内容が表示されない場合がある
※表示上の不具合であり、実際には獲得されていることを確認しております。

【2023/7/26 20:00追記】
・不安定な通信環境下でプレイした際、公演終了時にエラーが発生する場合がある
本エラーに遭遇されたお客様は、お手数ですが安定した通信環境でプレイ頂くか、異なる通信環境をお試しください。

【2023/7/26 17:00追記】
・公演プレイ中において、楽曲選択画面のプレビュー楽曲が重複して再生される場合がある

お客様には、ご迷惑をおかけいたしますことを深くお詫び申し上げます。

今後とも「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をよろしくお願いいたします。

i18n.content:
感谢您使用「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム（Yuume Ste）」。  

目前我们在游戏中确认到了以下的故障问题。  

正在修复的故障  

【2023/11/10 23:30追记】  
・在曲目选择画面中，有时光标所选曲目与预览中播放的曲目不一致  

【2023/10/10 17:00追记】  
・在相册中，有时无法显示带有签名的照片上的签名  
※确认重新保存相册后可以解决此问题。  
※本故障仅为显示问题，签名照片的数据仍被正常保存。  

・使用「Sign up with Apple」或「Sign in with Google」进行账号关联时，有时在关联时显示的玩家ID与实际不符  
※确认本故障仅为显示问题，账号关联功能本身正常运作。  

正在调查中的故障  

【2024/8/9 22:45追记】  
・在演剧联赛赛季2中，有时在决定所属班级时的演出无法播放  

【2024/7/30 17:00追记】  
・首次进入演剧联赛赛季2时，可能会根据赛季1的成果播放非预期的演出  

【2024/7/29 15:00追记】  
・通过演员扭蛋获得★4演员时，有时无法显示所获得的演员碎片内容  
※确认本故障仅为显示问题，实际已正常获得  

【2023/7/26 20:00追记】  
・在通信环境不稳定的情况下进行游戏时，演出结束后可能会出现错误  
※遇到该错误的玩家，请换至通信环境稳定的设备上进行游戏，或尝试更换通信环境  

【2023/7/26 17:00追记】  
・在演出进行中时，有时曲目选择画面的预览曲目会重复播放  

对于由此给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。  

今后也请多多支持「世界大明星 梦想星群」。
i18n.title: 关于已知问题

i18n.content:
Thank you for using "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."

We have currently confirmed the following issues in the game.

Issues currently being fixed

[Added at 23:30 on 11/10/2023]
- In the song selection screen, the selected song and the previewed song may not match.

[Added at 17:00 on 10/10/2023]
- In the album, the signature on signed photos may not display correctly.
* We have confirmed that this issue can be resolved by saving the album again.
* This issue is only related to the display in the album, and the data for signed photos is retained.

- When linking an account using "Sign up with Apple" or "Sign in with Google," the player ID displayed during account linking may be different.
* We have confirmed that this issue only affects display, and account linking is functioning normally.

Issues currently under investigation

[Added at 22:45 on 8/9/2024]
- In Theater League Season 2, the cutscene when determining class affiliation may not play correctly.

[Added at 17:00 on 7/30/2024]
- Upon first entering Theater League Season 2, a cutscene not intended for the current season may play depending on the results of Season 1.

[Added at 15:00 on 7/29/2024]
- In the Actor Gacha, when obtaining a ★4 actor, the Iruru actor piece may not display correctly in the acquired list.
* This is a display issue only, and we have confirmed that the actor is indeed obtained.

[Added at 20:00 on 7/26/2023]
- In unstable network environments, an error may occur at the end of a performance.
* If you encounter this error, please try playing the game in a stable network environment or switch to a different network environment.

[Added at 17:00 on 7/26/2023]
- During a performance, the preview songs on the song selection screen may play repeatedly.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause our customers.

We appreciate your continued support for "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."

本エラーに遭遇されたお客様は、お手数ですが安定した通信環境でプレイ頂くか、異なる通信環境をお試しください。

【2023/7/26 17:00追記】
・公演プレイ中において、楽曲選択画面のプレビュー楽曲が重複して再生される場合がある

お客様には、ご迷惑をおかけいたしますことを深くお詫び申し上げます。

今後とも「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をよろしくお願いいたします。

i18n.content:
感谢您使用「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム（Yuume Ste）」。  

目前我们在游戏中确认到了以下的故障问题。  

正在修复的故障  

【2023/11/10 23:30追记】  
・在曲目选择画面中，有时光标所选曲目与预览中播放的曲目不一致  

【2023/10/10 17:00追记】  
・在相册中，有时无法显示带有签名的照片上的签名  
※确认重新保存相册后可以解决此问题。  
※本故障仅为显示问题，签名照片的数据仍被正常保存。  

・使用「Sign up with Apple」或「Sign in with Google」进行账号关联时，有时在关联时显示的玩家ID与实际不符  
※确认本故障仅为显示问题，账号关联功能本身正常运作。  

正在调查中的故障  

【2024/8/9 22:45追记】  
・在演剧联赛赛季2中，有时在决定所属班级时的演出无法播放  

【2024/7/30 17:00追记】  
・首次进入演剧联赛赛季2时，可能会根据赛季1的成果播放非预期的演出  

【2024/7/29 15:00追记】  
・通过演员扭蛋获得★4演员时，有时无法显示所获得的演员碎片内容  
※确认本故障仅为显示问题，实际已正常获得  

【2023/7/26 20:00追记】  
・在通信环境不稳定的情况下进行游戏时，演出结束后可能会出现错误  
※遇到该错误的玩家，请换至通信环境稳定的设备上进行游戏，或尝试更换通信环境  

【2023/7/26 17:00追记】  
・在演出进行中时，有时曲目选择画面的预览曲目会重复播放  

对于由此给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。  

今后也请多多支持「世界大明星 梦想星群」。
i18n.title: 关于已知问题

i18n.content:
Thank you for using "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."

We have currently confirmed the following issues in the game.

Issues currently being fixed

[Added at 23:30 on 11/10/2023]
- In the song selection screen, the selected song and the previewed song may not match.

[Added at 17:00 on 10/10/2023]
- In the album, the signature on signed photos may not display correctly.
* We have confirmed that this issue can be resolved by saving the album again.
* This issue is only related to the display in the album, and the data for signed photos is retained.

- When linking an account using "Sign up with Apple" or "Sign in with Google," the player ID displayed during account linking may be different.
* We have confirmed that this issue only affects display, and account linking is functioning normally.

Issues currently under investigation

[Added at 22:45 on 8/9/2024]
- In Theater League Season 2, the cutscene when determining class affiliation may not play correctly.

[Added at 17:00 on 7/30/2024]
- Upon first entering Theater League Season 2, a cutscene not intended for the current season may play depending on the results of Season 1.

[Added at 15:00 on 7/29/2024]
- In the Actor Gacha, when obtaining a ★4 actor, the Iruru actor piece may not display correctly in the acquired list.
* This is a display issue only, and we have confirmed that the actor is indeed obtained.

[Added at 20:00 on 7/26/2023]
- In unstable network environments, an error may occur at the end of a performance.
* If you encounter this error, please try playing the game in a stable network environment or switch to a different network environment.

[Added at 17:00 on 7/26/2023]
- During a performance, the preview songs on the song selection screen may play repeatedly.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause our customers.

We appreciate your continued support for "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."
i18n.title: Known Issues

此外，当进行超过上限的感官等级强化时，「千寿いろは」的等级2～5仅消耗了强化素材，我们已逐步向「千寿いろは」的感官等级强化用户返还强化素材。

对因此问题受到影响的用户，我们深表歉意。

★3【来ちゃいました！】千寿いろは

★4【私を見守る大切な蝶】千寿いろは

对因此问题受到影响的用户，我们深表歉意。

今后也请多多关照「世界大明星 梦想星群」。
i18n.title: 已修正的 bug

i18n.content:
Thank you for using 「World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium」.

The following issues that occurred in the game have been fixed.
* If the fixes are not reflected, please try restarting the app.

Fixed Issues

[Added 2025/9/9 20:15]
- In the performance "Arabian Night", episodes 2 to 6 are not playing correctly.

[Added 2025/9/2 0:50]
- The campaign "Accessary Drop Rate 100% UP" is not displayed.

[Added 2025/9/1 15:05]
- The stamina consumption for the event "Natsu no Kio Ku no Nai Sho no Honne!" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 34
　Correct: 32
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

- In the high-score challenge of the event "Kan Shise! Phantom Meeting", the sense activation timing is not functioning at the correct timing.
【Before Fix】 133 seconds
【After Fix】 125 seconds

[Added 2025/8/25 12:05]
- In the "Main Story" of Sirius Chapter 4, the episode number may be displayed incorrectly.
　Additionally, after completing the 8th episode of Sirius Chapter 4 in the "Main Story", an error occurs when pressing the "Next Episode" button.

[Added 2025/8/20 18:55]
- In the "Main Story" of Sirius Chapter 4 Scene 2, the voice and text are mismatched.

[Added 2025/8/19 15:00]
- When the unlock level of "SSR [Birthday Night] Kathrina・Griebel" is "0" or "1", the poster is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2025/8/12 19:40]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III+" of "SSR Shomoe no Unmei de" has an incorrect activation condition.

Wrong: ◆ Own Performance Power increases by 35% (126% at max enhancement) ◆ Activation Condition: Actor belonging to Sirius is equipped
Correct: ◆ Own Performance Power increases by 35% (126% at max enhancement)

[Added 2025/8/12 12:00]
- In the "Sort/Filter" function of actors, under certain conditions, support-type icons "*" are displayed on "Shizuka" and "SenjuIroha".

[Added 2025/8/8 15:05]
- Under certain conditions when logging in, the reward for the "7th Day Login Bonus for Yumesute Day!" might be received twice.
* As an apology for this issue, we distributed the bonus items to users who did not receive the reward twice during the specified period.

* Compensation Items
・Theater Jewel (Free) ×150

* Compensation Target
・Accounts that logged in between 05:00 on August 7, 2025 and 05:00 on August 8, 2025.

[Added 2025/8/6 13:00]
- The bonus reward for the Special Event "Kathrina Birthday Performance 2025" is displayed incorrectly.
* Please refer to the announcement "[Kathrina Birthday Performance 2025]" for details on the compensation.

[Added 2025/8/4 18:37]
- Under certain conditions when logging in, an error may occur.
* As an apology for this issue, we distributed compensation items to affected users.

[Added 2025/8/1 6:10]
- In the "Training" mode, an error may occur when swapping already-composed actors.

[Added 2025/8/1 6:10]
- When transitioning to the home screen, it may take some time to load.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- The "Electron Chocolate Theater! Gacha" is not displayed on the gacha screen.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- In the bonus stage "STAGE 1" of the event "Urarakan Spring, Discover!", the sense activation timing is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- In the bonus stage "STAGE 2" of the event "Urarakan Spring, Discover!", the sense activation timing is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- When transitioning to the ranking screen of "Theater League: TRIPLE CAST", an error may occur.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- The stamina consumption of "1・2・3" is set to an unintended value.
　Wrong: 28
　Correct: 30
* It has been confirmed that the correct amount of event points and rewards can be obtained based on the stamina consumed.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- An error may occur when composing an actor that is already composed in the "Training" mode.

[Added 2025/7/31 15:00]
- When transitioning to the home screen, it may take some time to load.

[Added 2025/7/26 0:50]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, the total performance power may be displayed lower than expected under certain conditions.

[Added 2025/7/26 0:50]
- On certain devices, the number of additional lights that can be acquired in the "Reconfiguration" screen may not be displayed.

[Added 2025/7/26 11:20]
- On some titles, the displayed title is incorrect.

[Added 2025/7/21 13:15]
- The icon of the "2nd Birthday Pack [Niizuma Yae]" is displayed incorrectly.
* The sale was paused until the fix was completed, but it is now resumed.

[Added 2025/7/2 1:45]
- In the "★4 Actor Acquisition" scene, the voice may not play under certain conditions.

[Added 2025/1/31 18:00]
- In the "Photo" section, an error may occur when developing photos of some actors.

[Added 2025/1/26 20:05]
- The effect text of the leader ability of "★4 [Still Can't Stop Loving] ShiromaruMito" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×10
　Correct: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×10%
* It has been confirmed that the ability functions correctly despite the display issue.

[Added 2025/1/26 20:05]
- The effect text of the sense ability of "★4 [Trickster Fairy Invites You] AkiruKamira" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×5
　Correct: Increase Gekidan Denki actor count ×5%
* It has been confirmed that the ability functions correctly despite the display issue.

[Added 2024/11/21 14:40]
- In the "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, the bonus effect from link and star rank may not be reflected on the matching wait screen and final confirmation screen.
* It is a display issue, but the effect is functioning correctly.

[Added 2024/11/6 17:50]
- In the "Shigure Birthday Performance 2024" event, the music data for the song "Masquerade (Eden Ver.)" is incorrect.

[Added 2024/11/6 11:50]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[Added 2024/10/29 11:50]
- The ability "Performance Power Up III" of "SSR Cobalt Blue Waves" may not activate properly.

[Added 2024/10/28 16:55]
- An error may occur when selecting a stamp for reaching Star Rank 80 in the "Album" section.

[Added 2024/10/15 12:35]
- In the ability "Light Addition (Amplification) II" and "Light Addition (Special) II" of "SSR Banquet Star: Never End", the icon for sense light is not displayed.

[Added 2024/10/2 17:35]
- In the leader skill of "★4 [Come Out of the Picture Book] OtoriKokona", the effect may differ from the intended one in certain cases.

[Added 2024/9/24 17:20]
- An error may occur when pressing the "Performance" button.
* As compensation, we distributed "Stamina Drink ×1" to all users.

[Added 2024/9/19 22:40]
- An error may occur when selecting an event in the "Event Story" section.

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- Some packs cannot be purchased during the flash sale.

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- The leader skill effect of "★4 [Sing, Dance, and Raise a Glass] YonaguniHikari" is displayed incorrectly.
　Wrong: Reduce CT for the "Stage" category by 3 seconds
　Correct: Reduce CT for the "Stage" category by 5 seconds

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- In the Theater League Season 2, the class determination performance may not play properly under certain conditions.

[Added 2024/9/10 15:00]
- In the "Birthday Performance" event, incorrect game hints may be displayed.

[Added 2024/9/3 18:50]
- An error may occur when trying to transition to the Theater League TOP screen under certain conditions.

[Added 2024/8/21 15:10]
- In the result screen of the "Performance" mode, the bonus reward for accumulated points may be displayed multiple times.

[Added 2024/8/21 15:10]
- In the formation or final confirmation screen, the bonus of the event "VIBES IN BLUE" is not displayed.
* It is a display issue, but the bonus is functioning correctly.

[Added 2024/8/10 13:45]
- The categories of "[Once Again, the Departure of an Old Friend] Ramona・Wolf" and "[Waiting for the Small One] SenjuKoyomi" are mismatched.

[Added 2024/8/6 10:50]
- The leader skill of "[The Precious Butterfly Watching Me] SenjuIroha", "[Night of Vivid Colors] SasugaChisa", and "[The Most Important Thing] NiizumaYae" is functioning differently than intended in some cases.

[Added 2024/8/5 14:20]
- In the "Mission Pass", the "Mission Pass Purchase" button is displayed before 5:00 on August 1.

[Added 2024/8/5 14:20]
- In the "Mission Pass Purchase" dialog, the number of Theater Jewels (Purchased) consumed is displayed incorrectly.
* At the correct time when the purchase becomes available (8/1 5:00), the correct consumption number is displayed.
* The correct consumption number is 200 Theater Jewels (Purchased) per 400P.

[Added 2024/8/5 13:40]
- In the album page, the decoration "Kathrina's Birthday Frame" is not displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/8/1 15:00]
- The nameplate "Dai Star [Season 1]" may not be displayed in the highest stage when it was already acquired.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- In the "Pieces List Screen" of the "Possessions" section, when an actor has talent blooming stage 6, the piece conversion may not be possible.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- In the "Filter" function of accessories, the "Additional Ability" filter is not working properly.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- The screen orientation is fixed regardless of the device settings.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- In the rhythm game performance scene, the curtain may be displayed enlarged.

[Added 2024/7/31 15:00]
- The nameplate "Dai Star [Season 1]" may not be displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/7/27 22:20]
- In the possession list or formation screen, the filter function for accessories may not work properly, causing the app to freeze.

[Added 2024/7/27 22:20]
- When playing "Training" from a location other than the Theater Lobby, the result screen may not transition properly and instead return to the title screen.
* It has been confirmed that the training results are saved properly.

[Added 2024/7/23 19:00]
- In "Collaboration Performance" and "Challenge with a Partner" modes, an error may occur if a certain score or higher is achieved.

[Added 2024/7/18 22:00]
- In the "Emerald Medal Exchange", unexchanged posters cannot be exchanged, and exchanged posters may become exchangeable again.

[Added 2024/6/24 17:35]
- An error may occur when transitioning to the ranking screen of the "Circle Mission Rally".
* It is a display issue, but the actual ranking is saved correctly.

[Added 2024/6/24 17:35]
- An error may occur when transitioning to the gacha screen.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- After playing the long version of a song, the clear mark for difficulty STELLA or higher is displayed.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- An error may occur when opening the song details dialog in the song shop.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- The medal values may not be displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/6/21 17:15]
- In the event story screen, the unread badge may still be displayed even if all stories in the selected list are marked as read.

[Added 2024/6/20 15:10]
- In the poster details dialog, no actor is displayed under "Poster Appearance Actors".

[Added 2024/6/20 15:10]
- In the actor details dialog and poster details dialog, when switching to the status at maximum enhancement, the description indicating maximum enhancement may not be fully displayed.

[Added 2024/6/11 21:55]
- Under certain conditions, an error may occur when attempting to play "Training", which may prevent the actor from being used in future training sessions.
* As compensation, we distributed the corresponding number of "Theater Jewel (Free)" to affected users based on the duration of the issue.

[Added 2024/6/11 18:15]
- In the "Electric Princess Space [Re:]" event, an unintended accessory is displayed in the bonus rewards.
* It is a display issue, but the picked-up accessories are easier to drop.

[Added 2024/6/11 18:15]
- When playing a performance in continuous AUTO mode, the screen may darken and become unresponsive on the second and subsequent plays.
* Even when the screen is unresponsive, the performance results during AUTO play are saved and rewards are received.

[Added 2024/5/30 15:00]
- In the formation screen, an error may occur when attempting to compose an actor with a different card of the same actor already composed.
Example: If "★4 [Melody of Sorrow and Love] OtoriKokona" is already composed in the first slot, attempting to compose "★4 [Night Sky Reminds Me] OtoriKokona" in the second slot may cause an error.

[Added 2024/5/30 15:00]
- In the Market (Special), the icons of the nameplates "Pile of Coins" and "Banknotes" may not brighten after purchase.

[Added 2024/5/30 15:00]
- In the rhythm game "Wish upon a star" at difficulty STELLA, a MISS judgment may occur when AUTO play is performed with the "Mirror" option enabled.

[Added 2024/5/29 16:10]
- The effect text of the leader act of "★4 [In the Automaton Theater] Shizuka" and "★4 [The Backstage of a Dancing Doll] Kathrina・Griebel" is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2024/5/14 12:20]
- Account linking via "Sign up with Apple" cannot be performed.

[Added 2024/5/1 20:00]
- The theater effect "Increase SP gained from Training by XX%" is not functioning properly.

[Added 2024/4/19 19:35]
- In the mission "Welcome Back: Develop a ★3 or higher photo", users may not complete the mission even after developing a ★3 or higher photo.

[Added 2024/4/19 15:00]
- The dialog for detecting a disconnection during multiplay may be displayed at an unintended timing.

[Added 2024/4/11 18:35]
- When a sense with the effect "Increase Star Act Score by XX% for XX seconds" is activated, the effect may not be applied when the effect time ends.

[Added 2024/4/1 22:05]
- The name of the leader ability of "SSR Trio Melody and Demon" is displayed incorrectly.

[Added 2024/4/1 22:05]
- The help image in the song selection screen is not displayed.

[Added 2024/3/28 17:00]
- In the photo list screen, the filter function may not work properly, causing the app to freeze.

[Added 2024/3/28 17:00]
- In the event story list screen, the event logo at the lower left is not displayed correctly.

[Added 2024/3/27 22:15]

i18n.title: Fixed bugs

title: 修正済みの不具合

content:
「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をご利用いただき誠にありがとうございます。

「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」について

2025年4月11日実施のメンテナンス後より登場した新アイテム「デコペン」「ルミナスオイル」についてご説明いたします。

デコペンについて

「デコペン」は、使用することでサイン入りフォトのアビリティの種類を変更することができるアイテムとなります。
フォト詳細画面の「アビリティ変更」にて、変更先のアビリティを選択することで使用できます。
例えば、変更先のアビリティに「歌唱力」を選択した場合、「緋星のデコペン」または「虹星のデコペン」を使用することでアビリティの変更を行えます。
「デコペン」の種類と効果、必要数は以下の通りです。

* デコペンの種類と効果内容
・白星のデコペン：フォトのアビリティを「演技力アップ」に変更します。
・緋星のデコペン：フォトのアビリティを「歌唱力アップ」に変更します。
・黄星のデコペン：フォトのアビリティを「表現力アップ」に変更します。
・蒼星のデコペン：フォトのアビリティを「集中力アップ」に変更します。
・虹星のデコペン：フォトのアビリティを任意のアビリティに変更します。

* 「デコペン」の必要数
・白星のデコペン：30個
・緋星のデコペン：30個
・黄星のデコペン：30個
・蒼星のデコペン：30個
・虹星のデコペン：2個

※アビリティの+値が3以下の場合、どのアビリティに変更しても+値は変動しません。
※+値が4以上の「歌唱力アップ」「表現力アップ」「集中力アップ」のアビリティを「演技力アップ」に変更した場合、変更後のアビリティは「演技力アップ+3」となります。予めご了承ください。
※各アビリティ専用のデコペンと「虹星のデコペン」をどちらも必要数以上所持している場合、各アビリティ専用のデコペンが消費されます。
※各アビリティ専用のデコペンと「虹星のデコペン」を同時に使用することはできません。予めご了承ください。

ルミナスオイルについて

「ルミナスオイル」は、使用することでサイン入りフォトのアビリティの+値を変更することができるアイテムとなります。
フォト詳細画面の「アビリティ+上昇」にて、上昇後の値を選択することで使用できます。
「ルミナスオイル」の必要数は以下の通りです。

* 「ルミナスオイル」の必要数
・+値を1から2に上昇：3個
・+値を2から3に上昇：6個
・+値を3から4に上昇：9個
・+値を4から5に上昇：12個

※+値をまとめて上昇させる場合、必要数は各段階の合計数となります。

「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」の入手方法

2025年4月11日のメンテナンス後より、協力公演の「Edenホール」にて獲得することができます。
「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」は確率でのドロップとなります。

* ドロップ仕様について
「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」は、消費したスタミナの消費量が多いほどドロップ率が上昇します。

注意事項

・「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」は、「撮影フィルム【★】」で現像したフォトに使用することはできません。予めご了承ください。
・「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」の入手方法は予告なく変更する場合がございます。

今後とも「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をよろしくお願いいたします。

i18n.content:
感谢您使用「ユメステ（World Daiseteru Yume Stellarium）」。  

关于「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」  

以下将对2025年4月11日维护后登场的新道具「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」进行说明。  

关于「デコペン」  

「デコペン」是一种可以更改签名照片能力种类的道具。  
在照片详情页面的「能力更改」中，选择要更改的目标能力即可使用。  
例如，如果选择将能力更改为「歌唱力」，则可以使用「緋星のデコペン」或「虹星のデコペン」进行更改。  
「デコペン」的种类和效果、所需数量如下：  

* 「デコペン」的种类和效果内容  
- 白星のデコペン：将照片的能力更改为「演技力アップ」。  
- 緋星のデコペン：将照片的能力更改为「歌唱力アップ」。  
- 黄星のデコペン：将照片的能力更改为「表现力アップ」。  
- 蒼星のデコペン：将照片的能力更改为「集中力アップ」。  
- 虹星のデコペン：可将照片的能力更改为任意的能力。  

* 「デコペン」的所需数量  
- 白星のデコペン：30个  
- 緋星のデコペン：30个  
- 黄星のデコペン：30个  
- 蒼星のデコペン：30个  
- 虹星のデコペン：2个  

※如果能力的+值为3或以下，无论更改为哪种能力，+值都不会发生变化。  
※如果将+值为4或以上的「歌唱力アップ」「表现力アップ」「集中力アップ」能力更改为「演技力アップ」，更改后的能力将变为「演技力アップ+3」。请事先了解。  
※如果同时持有某项能力专用的「デコペン」和「虹星のデコペン」，当数量超过所需时，将优先消耗能力专用的「デコペン」。  
※不能同时使用某项能力专用的「デコペン」和「虹星のデコペン」。请事先了解。  

关于「ルミナスオイル」  

「ルミナスオイル」是一种可以更改签名照片能力+值的道具。  
在照片详情页面的「能力+上升」中，选择上升后的+值即可使用。  
「ルミナスオイル」的所需数量如下：  

* 「ルミナスオイル」的所需数量  
- 将+值从1提升到2：3个  
- 将+值从2提升到3：6个  
- 将+值从3提升到4：9个  
- 将+值从4提升到5：12个  

※如果+值连续提升，所需数量为各阶段所需数量的总和。  

「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」的获取方式  

从2025年4月11日维护后起，可在合作演出的「Edenホール」中获得。  
「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」将以一定概率掉落。  

* 关于掉落机制  
「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」的掉落率会随着所消耗的耐力值增加而上升。  

注意事项  

- 「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」无法用于通过「撮影フィルム【★】」显影的照片。请事先了解。  
- 「デコペン」和「ルミナスオイル」的获取方式可能会在未预告的情况下进行变更。  

今后也请继续支持「世界大明星 梦想星群（World Daiseteru Yume Stellarium）」。
i18n.title: 关于「Deco Pen」和「Luminous Oil」

i18n.content:
Thank you for using "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."

About "Decopen" and "Luminus Oil"

We would like to explain the new items "Decopen" and "Luminus Oil" that became available after the maintenance on April 11, 2025.

About Decopen

"Decopen" is an item that allows you to change the type of ability on signed photos.  
You can use it by selecting the ability you want to change to in the "Ability Change" section of the photo detail screen.  
For example, if you select "Singing Power" as the target ability, you can change the ability by using either "Crimson Star Decopen" or "Rainbow Star Decopen."  
The types of "Decopen," their effects, and the required number are as follows:

* Types and effects of Decopen in Iruru  
- White Star Decopen: Changes the photo's ability to "Acting Power Up."  
- Crimson Star Decopen: Changes the photo's ability to "Singing Power Up."  
- Amber Star Decopen: Changes the photo's ability to "Expression Power Up."  
- Azure Star Decopen: Changes the photo's ability to "Concentration Power Up."  
- Rainbow Star Decopen: Changes the photo's ability to any desired ability.  

* Required number of Decopens  
- White Star Decopen: 30 pieces  
- Crimson Star Decopen: 30 pieces  
- Amber Star Decopen: 30 pieces  
- Azure Star Decopen: 30 pieces  
- Rainbow Star Decopen: 2 pieces  

- Note: If the current +value of the ability is 3 or less, it will remain unchanged regardless of the target ability.  
- Note: If you change an ability with a +value of 4 or more for "Singing Power Up," "Expression Power Up," or "Concentration Power Up" to "Acting Power Up," the new ability will be "Acting Power Up +3." Please be aware of this in advance.  
- Note: If you have more than the required number of both the dedicated Decopen for a specific ability and "Rainbow Star Decopen," the dedicated Decopen will be consumed first.  
- Note: You cannot use a dedicated Decopen for a specific ability and "Rainbow Star Decopen" at the same time. Please be aware of this in advance.

About Luminus Oil

"Luminus Oil" is an item that allows you to change the +value of the ability on signed photos.  
You can use it by selecting the desired +value in the "Ability + Boost" section of the photo detail screen.  
The required number of "Luminus Oil" is as follows:

* Required number of Luminus Oil  
- Boost +value from 1 to 2: 3 pieces  
- Boost +value from 2 to 3: 6 pieces  
- Boost +value from 3 to 4: 9 pieces  
- Boost +value from 4 to 5: 12 pieces  

- Note: When boosting the +value in multiple steps at once, the required number is the total of the quantities for each step.

How to obtain "Decopen" and "Luminus Oil"

From the maintenance on April 11, 2025, you can obtain them at the collaborative performance "Eden Hall."  
"Decopen" and "Luminus Oil" will be dropped with a certain probability.

* Drop rate details  
The drop rate of "Decopen" and "Luminus Oil" increases the more stamina is consumed.

Important Notes

- "Decopen" and "Luminus Oil" cannot be used on photos developed with "Photographic Film [★]." Please be aware of this in advance.  
- The ways to obtain "Decopen" and "Luminus Oil" may be changed without prior notice.

We appreciate your continued support for "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."
i18n.title:
About "Deco Pen" and "Luminous Oil"  
(From the announcement of Yumestē, a rhythm game)  
*Note: Yumestē is the abbreviation for the game title "World Daisuteru Yume no Sterariyumu".*

title: 「デコペン」および「ルミナスオイル」について

content:
「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をご利用いただき誠にありがとうございます。

【6/11 18:15追記】
「STAGE 3」および「STAGE 19」につきまして、一部内容を調整いたしました。

* STAGE 3
お題の内容を調整いたしました。

【変更前】アクターを並べ替えてセンスの発動を全て成功させよう！
【変更後】アクターを配置変更で並べ替えて、センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
※クリア条件に変更はありません。

* STAGE 19
クリア条件のスコアを調整いたしました。

【変更前】30,104,568
【変更後】29,604,568

「改幕公演～第零幕～」追加！

コンテンツ概要

「改幕公演～第零幕～」は、ステージごとに用意されているアクター、ポスター、アクセサリーで編成を行い、ステージのクリアを目指すコンテンツです。
配置変更でのアクターの並べ替え、ステージ毎に用意されているアクターへの入れ替えや、ポスター、アクセサリーを装備させることで、お題に沿った編成を組みましょう。

各ステージには、アクターカード変更不可や配置位置固定などの編成に関する制限が設けられています。
クリア条件を満たすと次のステージに進むことができ、クリア状況に応じて導きのかけらや★4一人以上確定アンコール10連ガチャチケットなどを入手することができます。

* お題
・STAGE 1：演技力の高いアクターを編成してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 2：演技力の高いアクターを編成してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 3：アクターを配置変更で並べ替えて、センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
・STAGE 4：アクターカードの変更と並べ替えを行い、センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
・STAGE 5：アクターカードを並べ替えてスターアクトを1回発動しよう！
・STAGE 6：アクターカードを変更してスターアクトを1回発動しよう！
・STAGE 7：アクターカードの変更と並べ替えを行い、スターアクトを2回発動しよう！
・STAGE 8：スターアクトを2回発動して高スコアを狙おう！
・STAGE 9：ポスターを活用してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 10：アクセサリーを活用してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 11：アクターのセンス効果でプリンシパルゲージを貯めよう！
・STAGE 12：ポスターを活用してプリンシパルゲージを貯めよう！
・STAGE 13：プリンシパルゲージを貯めて高スコアを狙おう！
・STAGE 14：ポスターを活用してスターアクトを1回発動しよう！
・STAGE 15：センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
・STAGE 16：センスの発動を全て成功させ、高スコアを狙おう！
・STAGE 17：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！
・STAGE 18：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！
・STAGE 19：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！
・STAGE 20：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！

* 報酬一覧
・STAGE 1：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 2：蒼玉のメダル×400個
・STAGE 3：役者名鑑×350個
・STAGE 4：花形名鑑×250個
・STAGE 5：ジュゴン像×100個
・STAGE 6：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 7：スターの煌き×20個
・STAGE 8：紫玉のメダル×3個
・STAGE 9：銅の額縁×650個
・STAGE 10：アクターガチャチケット×5枚
・STAGE 11：スター名鑑×150個
・STAGE 12：銀の額縁×450個
・STAGE 13：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 14：金の額縁×100個
・STAGE 15：ジュゴン像×200個
・STAGE 16：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 17：スターの煌き×20個
・STAGE 18：明星の額縁×50個
・STAGE 19：導きのかけら×5個
・STAGE 20：★4一人以上確定アンコール10連ガチャチケット×1枚

開催期間

2025年6月10日 メンテナンス後 ～ 期限なし

挑戦方法

ホーム画面左の「改幕公演～第零幕～」ボタンより挑戦することができます。

注意事項

・全ステージクリア後、「改幕公演～第零幕～」ボタンは非表示となり、再度挑戦することはできません。予めご了承ください。
・本コンテンツで編成可能なアクター、ポスター、アクセサリーは全ユーザー共通となります。
・本コンテンツで編成可能なアクターには、スターランクによる演技力ボーナス、劇場・サポート劇団効果、アルバム効果は適用されません。予めご了承ください。
・本コンテンツでは、所持アクターの育成状況やポスターおよびアクセサリーの強化状態は反映されません。予めご了承ください。
・本コンテンツで編成可能なアクター、ポスター、アクセサリーを強化することはできません。予めご了承ください。
・開催スケジュールおよびステージ内容は予告なく変更する場合がございます。

今後とも「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をよろしくお願いいたします。

i18n.content:
感谢您一直以来对「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」（World Daisuteru Yume Stella Rium）的支持。

【6/11 18:15追记】  
关于「STAGE 3」和「STAGE 19」，我们对部分内容进行了调整。

* STAGE 3  
调整了任务内容。

【调整前】将演员重新排列，使所有“センス”发动成功！  
【调整后】通过配置变更排列演员，使所有“センス”发动成功！  
※ 清除条件没有变更。

* STAGE 19  
调整了清除所需的分数。

【调整前】30,104,568  
【调整后】29,604,568  

新增「改幕公演～第零幕～」！

内容概要

「改幕公演～第零幕～」是一项以每个舞台准备的演员、海报和饰品进行编组，并以达成舞台清除为目标的玩法。  
请通过配置变更重新排列演员，以及替换每个舞台准备的演员、装备海报和饰品，来组合符合任务要求的阵容。

每个舞台都设有编组上的限制，例如无法更改演员卡牌、固定配置位置等。  
满足清除条件后即可进入下一舞台，根据清除进度可以获得“導きのかけら”（Mikakera）或“★4一人以上確定アンコール10連ガチャチケット”（★4一人以上确定安可10连扭蛋券）等道具。

* 各舞台任务  
・STAGE 1：编组演技力高的演员，获取分数！  
・STAGE 2：编组演技力高的演员，获取分数！  
・STAGE 3：通过配置变更排列演员，使所有“センス”发动成功！  
・STAGE 4：通过更改演员卡牌和重新排列，使所有“センス”发动成功！  
・STAGE 5：通过排列演员卡牌，发动一次“スターアクト”！  
・STAGE 6：通过更改演员卡牌，发动一次“スターアクト”！  
・STAGE 7：通过更改和排列演员卡牌，发动两次“スターアクト”！  
・STAGE 8：发动两次“スターアクト”，争取高分数！  
・STAGE 9：利用海报获取分数！  
・STAGE 10：利用饰品获取分数！  
・STAGE 11：通过演员的“センス”效果积累プリンシパルゲージ（Principal Gauge）！  
・STAGE 12：利用海报积累プリンシパルゲージ（Principal Gauge）！  
・STAGE 13：积累プリンシパルゲージ（Principal Gauge），争取高分数！  
・STAGE 14：利用海报发动一次“スターアクト”！  
・STAGE 15：使所有“センス”发动成功！  
・STAGE 16：使所有“センス”发动成功，争取高分数！  
・STAGE 17：达成所有清除条件！  
・STAGE 18：达成所有清除条件！  
・STAGE 19：达成所有清除条件！  
・STAGE 20：达成所有清除条件！

* 各舞台奖励一览  
・STAGE 1：练习剧本【中级】×300个  
・STAGE 2：青玉奖章×400个  
・STAGE 3：演员图鉴×350个  
・STAGE 4：主角图鉴×250个  
・STAGE 5：儒艮雕像×100个  
・STAGE 6：练习剧本【中级】×300个  
・STAGE 7：明星的辉光×20个  
・STAGE 8：紫玉奖章×3个  
・STAGE 9：铜制相框×650个  
・STAGE 10：演员扭蛋券×5张  
・STAGE 11：明星图鉴×150个  
・STAGE 12：银制相框×450个  
・STAGE 13：练习剧本【中级】×300个  
・STAGE 14：金制相框×100个  
・STAGE 15：儒艮雕像×200个  
・STAGE 16：练习剧本【中级】×300个  
・STAGE 17：明星的辉光×20个  
・STAGE 18：明星相框×50个  
・STAGE 19：導きのかけら（Mikakera）×5个  
・STAGE 20：★4一人以上确定安可10连扭蛋券×1张  

活动期间  

2025年6月10日维护后～无期限  

挑战方法  

可通过主画面左侧的「改幕公演～第零幕～」按钮进行挑战。  

注意事项  

・完成所有舞台后，「改幕公演～第零幕～」按钮将被隐藏，无法再次挑战。敬请谅解。  
・本内容中可以使用的演员、海报和饰品对所有用户相同。  
・本内容中，演员的星级带来的演技力加成、剧院及支援剧团效果、专辑效果不适用。敬请谅解。  
・本内容中不会反映所持演员的培养情况以及海报和饰品的强化状态。敬请谅解。  
・本内容中无法对可用的演员、海报和饰品进行强化。敬请谅解。  
・活动时间及舞台内容可能在未提前通知的情况下进行变更。

今后也请继续支持「世界大明星 梦想星群」（ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム / World Daisuteru Yume Stella Rium）！
i18n.title: 「改幕公演～第零幕～」追加！

i18n.content:
Thank you for using "YuMeSte" (World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium).

[Added at 18:15 on June 11]
We have adjusted some Iruru in "STAGE 3" and "STAGE 19."

* STAGE 3  
We have adjusted the Iruru in the objective.  

[Before Change] Arrange the actors and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
[After Change] Rearrange the actors by changing their positions and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
* There are no changes to the clear conditions.

* STAGE 19  
We have adjusted the score for the clear conditions.  

[Before Change] 30,104,568  
[After Change] 29,604,568  

"Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" is now added!

Content Overview

"Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" is a content where you aim to clear each stage by composing a team using actors, posters, and accessories provided for each stage. By rearranging actors through position changes, replacing actors with those available for each stage, and equipping posters and accessories, create a composition that matches the stage's objective.

Each stage has restrictions regarding team composition, such as being unable to change actor cards or having fixed positions. Once you meet the clear conditions, you can proceed to the next stage. Depending on your clear status, you will be able to obtain items such as "Michibiki no Kusari" (Guiding Fragment) and a 10-roll gacha ticket with at least one ★4 actor guaranteed.

* Objectives  
- STAGE 1: Compose a team with high-acting actors and earn score!  
- STAGE 2: Compose a team with high-acting actors and earn score!  
- STAGE 3: Rearrange the actors by changing their positions and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
- STAGE 4: Change and rearrange actor cards and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
- STAGE 5: Rearrange actor cards and trigger Star Act once!  
- STAGE 6: Change actor cards and trigger Star Act once!  
- STAGE 7: Change and rearrange actor cards and trigger Star Act twice!  
- STAGE 8: Trigger Star Act twice and aim for a high score!  
- STAGE 9: Use posters to earn score!  
- STAGE 10: Use accessories to earn score!  
- STAGE 11: Fill the Principal Gauge using the actors' Sense effects!  
- STAGE 12: Use posters to fill the Principal Gauge!  
- STAGE 13: Fill the Principal Gauge and aim for a high score!  
- STAGE 14: Use posters to trigger Star Act once!  
- STAGE 15: Successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
- STAGE 16: Successfully trigger all Sense abilities and aim for a high score!  
- STAGE 17: Complete all clear conditions!  
- STAGE 18: Complete all clear conditions!  
- STAGE 19: Complete all clear conditions!  
- STAGE 20: Complete all clear conditions!

* Reward List  
- STAGE 1: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 2: Blue Jade Medal ×400  
- STAGE 3: Actor Directory ×350  
- STAGE 4: Star Actor Directory ×250  
- STAGE 5: Dugong Statue ×100  
- STAGE 6: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 7: Star's Radiance ×20  
- STAGE 8: Purple Jade Medal ×3  
- STAGE 9: Bronze Picture Frame ×650  
- STAGE 10: Actor Gacha Ticket ×5  
- STAGE 11: Star Actor Directory ×150  
- STAGE 12: Silver Picture Frame ×450  
- STAGE 13: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 14: Gold Picture Frame ×100  
- STAGE 15: Dugong Statue ×200  
- STAGE 16: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 17: Star's Radiance ×20  
- STAGE 18: Celestial Star Picture Frame ×50  
- STAGE 19: Michibiki no Kusari ×5  
- STAGE 20: 10-roll gacha ticket with at least one ★4 actor guaranteed ×1  

Event Period  

From after maintenance on June 10, 2025 ~ No time limit  

How to Challenge  

You can challenge by clicking the "Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" button on the left side of the home screen.  

Notes  

- After clearing all stages, the "Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" button will be hidden, and you will not be able to challenge again. Please understand this beforehand.  
- The actors, posters, and accessories available for composition in this content are the same for all users.  
- In this content, the acting power bonus from Star Rank, theater and support troupe effects, and album effects will not be applied to the available actors. Please understand this beforehand.  
- In this content, the training level of actors, or the enhancement status of posters and accessories will not be reflected. Please understand this beforehand.  
- In this content, you cannot enhance the actors, posters, and accessories available for composition. Please understand this beforehand.  
- The schedule for the content and the Iruru in each stage may be changed without prior notice.  

We look forward to continuing to support "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."
i18n.title: "Kaimaku Kōen ~Dai Zero Maku~" Added!

i18n.content:
Thank you for using "YuMeSte" (World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium).

[Added at 18:15 on June 11]
We have adjusted some Iruru in "STAGE 3" and "STAGE 19."

* STAGE 3  
We have adjusted the Iruru in the objective.  

[Before Change] Arrange the actors and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
[After Change] Rearrange the actors by changing their positions and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
* There are no changes to the clear conditions.

* STAGE 19  
We have adjusted the score for the clear conditions.  

[Before Change] 30,104,568  
[After Change] 29,604,568  

"Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" is now added!

Content Overview

"Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" is a content where you aim to clear each stage by composing a team using actors, posters, and accessories provided for each stage. By rearranging actors through position changes, replacing actors with those available for each stage, and equipping posters and accessories, create a composition that matches the stage's objective.

Each stage has restrictions regarding team composition, such as being unable to change actor cards or having fixed positions. Once you meet the clear conditions, you can proceed to the next stage. Depending on your clear status, you will be able to obtain items such as "Michibiki no Kusari" (Guiding Fragment) and a 10-roll gacha ticket with at least one ★4 actor guaranteed.

* Objectives  
- STAGE 1: Compose a team with high-acting actors and earn score!  
- STAGE 2: Compose a team with high-acting actors and earn score!  
- STAGE 3: Rearrange the actors by changing their positions and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
- STAGE 4: Change and rearrange actor cards and successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
- STAGE 5: Rearrange actor cards and trigger Star Act once!  
- STAGE 6: Change actor cards and trigger Star Act once!  
- STAGE 7: Change and rearrange actor cards and trigger Star Act twice!  
- STAGE 8: Trigger Star Act twice and aim for a high score!  
- STAGE 9: Use posters to earn score!  
- STAGE 10: Use accessories to earn score!  
- STAGE 11: Fill the Principal Gauge using the actors' Sense effects!  
- STAGE 12: Use posters to fill the Principal Gauge!  
- STAGE 13: Fill the Principal Gauge and aim for a high score!  
- STAGE 14: Use posters to trigger Star Act once!  
- STAGE 15: Successfully trigger all Sense abilities!  
- STAGE 16: Successfully trigger all Sense abilities and aim for a high score!  
- STAGE 17: Complete all clear conditions!  
- STAGE 18: Complete all clear conditions!  
- STAGE 19: Complete all clear conditions!  
- STAGE 20: Complete all clear conditions!

* Reward List  
- STAGE 1: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 2: Blue Jade Medal ×400  
- STAGE 3: Actor Directory ×350  
- STAGE 4: Star Actor Directory ×250  
- STAGE 5: Dugong Statue ×100  
- STAGE 6: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 7: Star's Radiance ×20  
- STAGE 8: Purple Jade Medal ×3  
- STAGE 9: Bronze Picture Frame ×650  
- STAGE 10: Actor Gacha Ticket ×5  
- STAGE 11: Star Actor Directory ×150  
- STAGE 12: Silver Picture Frame ×450  
- STAGE 13: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 14: Gold Picture Frame ×100  
- STAGE 15: Dugong Statue ×200  
- STAGE 16: Practice Script [Intermediate] ×300  
- STAGE 17: Star's Radiance ×20  
- STAGE 18: Celestial Star Picture Frame ×50  
- STAGE 19: Michibiki no Kusari ×5  
- STAGE 20: 10-roll gacha ticket with at least one ★4 actor guaranteed ×1  

Event Period  

From after maintenance on June 10, 2025 ~ No time limit  

How to Challenge  

You can challenge by clicking the "Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" button on the left side of the home screen.  

Notes  

- After clearing all stages, the "Kaimaku Kōen ~Jiroku no Kō~" button will be hidden, and you will not be able to challenge again. Please understand this beforehand.  
- The actors, posters, and accessories available for composition in this content are the same for all users.  
- In this content, the acting power bonus from Star Rank, theater and support troupe effects, and album effects will not be applied to the available actors. Please understand this beforehand.  
- In this content, the training level of actors, or the enhancement status of posters and accessories will not be reflected. Please understand this beforehand.  
- In this content, you cannot enhance the actors, posters, and accessories available for composition. Please understand this beforehand.  
- The schedule for the content and the Iruru in each stage may be changed without prior notice.  

We look forward to continuing to support "World Dai Star: Yume no Stellarium."
i18n.title: "Kaimaku Kōen ~Dai Zero Maku~" Added!

content:
「ワールドダイスター 夢のステラリウム」をご利用いただき誠にありがとうございます。

【6/11 18:15追記】
「STAGE 3」および「STAGE 19」につきまして、一部内容を調整いたしました。

* STAGE 3
お題の内容を調整いたしました。

【変更前】アクターを並べ替えてセンスの発動を全て成功させよう！
【変更後】アクターを配置変更で並べ替えて、センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
※クリア条件に変更はありません。

* STAGE 19
クリア条件のスコアを調整いたしました。

【変更前】30,104,568
【変更後】29,604,568

「改幕公演～第零幕～」追加！

コンテンツ概要

「改幕公演～第零幕～」は、ステージごとに用意されているアクター、ポスター、アクセサリーで編成を行い、ステージのクリアを目指すコンテンツです。
配置変更でのアクターの並べ替え、ステージ毎に用意されているアクターへの入れ替えや、ポスター、アクセサリーを装備させることで、お題に沿った編成を組みましょう。

各ステージには、アクターカード変更不可や配置位置固定などの編成に関する制限が設けられています。
クリア条件を満たすと次のステージに進むことができ、クリア状況に応じて導きのかけらや★4一人以上確定アンコール10連ガチャチケットなどを入手することができます。

* お題
・STAGE 1：演技力の高いアクターを編成してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 2：演技力の高いアクターを編成してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 3：アクターを配置変更で並べ替えて、センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
・STAGE 4：アクターカードの変更と並べ替えを行い、センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
・STAGE 5：アクターカードを並べ替えてスターアクトを1回発動しよう！
・STAGE 6：アクターカードを変更してスターアクトを1回発動しよう！
・STAGE 7：アクターカードの変更と並べ替えを行い、スターアクトを2回発動しよう！
・STAGE 8：スターアクトを2回発動して高スコアを狙おう！
・STAGE 9：ポスターを活用してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 10：アクセサリーを活用してスコアを獲得しよう！
・STAGE 11：アクターのセンス効果でプリンシパルゲージを貯めよう！
・STAGE 12：ポスターを活用してプリンシパルゲージを貯めよう！
・STAGE 13：プリンシパルゲージを貯めて高スコアを狙おう！
・STAGE 14：ポスターを活用してスターアクトを1回発動しよう！
・STAGE 15：センスの発動を全て成功させよう！
・STAGE 16：センスの発動を全て成功させ、高スコアを狙おう！
・STAGE 17：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！
・STAGE 18：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！
・STAGE 19：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！
・STAGE 20：クリア条件を全て達成しよう！

* 報酬一覧
・STAGE 1：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 2：蒼玉のメダル×400個
・STAGE 3：役者名鑑×350個
・STAGE 4：花形名鑑×250個
・STAGE 5：ジュゴン像×100個
・STAGE 6：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 7：スターの煌き×20個
・STAGE 8：紫玉のメダル×3個
・STAGE 9：銅の額縁×650個
・STAGE 10：アクターガチャチケット×5枚
・STAGE 11：スター名鑑×150個
・STAGE 12：銀の額縁×450個
・STAGE 13：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 14：金の額縁×100個
・STAGE 15：ジュゴン像×200個
・STAGE 16：練習台本【中級】×300個
・STAGE 17：スターの煌き×20個
・STAGE 18：明星の額縁×50個
・STAGE 19：導きのかけら×5個
・STAGE 20：★4一人以上確定アンコール10連ガチャチケット×1枚

開催期間

2025年6月10日 メンテナンス後 ～ 期限なし

挑戦方法

ホーム画面左の「改幕公演～第零幕～」ボタンより挑戦することができます。

注意事項

・全ステージクリア後、「改幕公演～第零幕～」ボタンは非表示となり、再度挑戦することはできません。予めご了承ください。
・本コンテンツで編成可能なアクター、ポスター、アクセサリーは全ユーザー共通となります。
・本コンテンツで編成可能なアクターには、スターランクによる演技力ボーナス、劇場・サポート劇団効果、アルバム効果は適用されません。予めご了承ください。
・本コンテンツでは、所持アクターの育成状況やポスターおよびアクセサリーの強化状態は反映されません。予めご了承ください。
・本コンテンツで編成可能なアクター、ポスター、アクセサリーを強化することはできません。予めご了承ください。
・開催スケジュールおよびステージ内容は予告なく変更する場合がございます。
